. </div>
2925 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="13" met="girisa" xml:id="kakavin_13">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-\-\-+++++\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">kalalu lakunirosən koṅaṅ taṅ patapan arūm</l>
. <l n="b">kagiri-giri patapniṅ merv akveh makapuratuk</l>
2930 <l n="c">saviji tika maṅuṅgul tumpaṅnyādbhuta savəlas</l>
. <l n="d">pucak ika kadi teja hyaṅ sūryān vahu sumənə̄</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d">
2935 <lem wit="#T">sūryān vahu</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sūryā vahu</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.02" n="2">
2940 <l n="a">pinatiga ya marəp pat pantinyāvəlar aratā</l>
. <l n="b">paḍa pinadu tinumpaṅ sakvehnyārəja hinəduk</l>
. <l n="c">ri natar ika mavelālvātaṇḍəs mamarakata</l>
. <l n="d">paṅəḍap-əḍap i tejanyan polah makagurilap.</l>
. </lg><!-- note: checkj transl, changed from mamarakata to mamarakatap -->
2945 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">ya marəp pat</lem><rdg wit="#L">ya marə pāt</rdg><rdg wit="#T">ta ya marəp pāt</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">sakvehnyārəja</lem><rdg wit="#T">sakvehnya rəja</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">mavelālvātaṇḍəs</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">mavəlālvātaṇḍəs</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#T">mamarakata</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mamarakatap</rdg></app>
2950 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">polah</lem><rdg wit="#T">pojar lah</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">cara-caranika rāmyāpan baprāhaləp aruhur</l>
. <l n="b">inukir inapi tekaṅ gopuntən rəcəp alaṅə̄</l>
2955 <l n="c">carita cinaritākram nyāsanyātulis atulis</l>
. <l n="d">ri pucak ika karəsrəs liṅgodbhāva cinarita</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P #T">gopuntən</lem><rdg wit="#L">gopuntəp</rdg></app>
2960 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #T">nyāsanyātulis</lem><rdg wit="#P">yāśanyātulis</rdg><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L">yaśanyātulis</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">lalayan inukir arja ndan rāmāyaṇacarita</l>
. <l n="b">vray ika paḍa maṅaṅkat vuṅkal kral ta ya maṅusuṅ</l>
2965 <l n="c">hana ta kapi mamuṇḍut vuṅkal sevu ḍəpanika</l>
. <l n="d">pravara kapi hanūmān sugrīvāṅaliha gunuṅ</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P">lalayan inukir</lem><rdg wit="#L #T">lalaya hinukir</rdg></app>
2970 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">rāmāyaṇacarita</lem><rdg wit="#T">rāmayaṇacarita</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P #T">ta</lem><rdg wit="#L">ta ya</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">mamuṇḍut</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">amuṇḍut</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.05" n="5">
2975 <l n="a">hana ta kapi matambak salvāniṅ pasir inusī</l>
. <l n="b">bañunika kadi molah mīnānūt y ryak aṅicipir</l>
. <l n="c">aruñu-ruñu kadi lvirniṅ byaktān vənaṅ alapən</l>
. <l n="d">təkapiṅ aṅukir āpan kīrṇa nyāsanika ləyəp.</l>
. </lg>
2980 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#L #P">mīnānūt y ryak</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ">mīnānūt ryak</rdg><rdg wit="#T">minanūt yyak</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#T">byaktān</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">byaktā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <!-- <div type="interpolation">
2985<app><lem wit="#T"><lg n="5">
.<l n="a">tan ucapən ikaṅ i jro rāmyākveh səkar avaṅi</l>
.<l n="b">ri harəp ika mahān cən kapvārjjā tulis arəṇika</l>
. <l n="c">hana patani kasimpar lor vetan ləṅəṅ aṅuṅaṅ</l>
. <l n="d">ya ta dunuṅanirān ton rāmyānyān rəcəp alaṅə̄</l>
2990</lg></lem>
.<note type="altLem">ri harəp ika, ..., rəcəp alaṅə.</note>
.<note>This stanza is absent in <ptr target="#L"/> and seems extraneous to our text.</note>
.</app></div>-->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.06" n="6">
2995 <l n="a">nr̥patisuta tumiṅhal riṅ lambaṅ ləṅəṅ alaləh</l>
. <l n="b">paṅikət ika hana vvaṅ miṅgat mvaṅ kalulut ika</l>
. <l n="c">rinasa-rasanireṅ tvas rəsrəsniṅ vahu hatəmu</l>
. <l n="d">sapada hana cinəṅgan cihnanyālara cinarik</l>
. </lg>
3000 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">riṅ lambaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ri lambu</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">dadi ta sira tumiṅhal riṅ paṇḍan səḍəṅ asəkar</l>
. <l n="b">puḍak ika maṅuḍoḍā līlā lvir vətis alaris</l>
. <l n="c">təṅah aṅəlih umambət lvirniṅ pādapa kasirir</l>
3005 <l n="d">sagəmuh i susuniṅ dyah taṅ nyuh danta paja-paja</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem type="norm">maṅuḍoḍā</lem>
3010 <rdg wit="#EdZ">maṅuḍoḍan</rdg><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">maṅudodhā</rdg><rdg wit="#T">maṅudhodā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">iniṅət-iṅət ira lvir tiṅkahniṅ pura katikā</l>
. <l n="b">patapan arəcəp akveh nyāsanyāmuvuhi laṅə̄</l>
3015 <l n="c">niyatanika pasevan honyaṅ gopura maruhur</l>
. <l n="d">vvaya ta viku ri saṇḍiṅniṅ kontən maṅucap-ucap.</l>
. </lg>
. <!-- PYñ 13.8: iniṅĕt-iṅĕt ira lwir tiṅkah niṅ puraṇa tikā / patapan arĕcĕp (better the var. pura katika). -->
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#P #T">pura katikā</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">puraṇa ṭika</rdg><rdg wit="#EdZ">puraka ṭikā</rdg></app>
3020 <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA">nyāsanyāmuvuhi</lem><rdg wit="#L">yaśanyāmuvuhi</rdg><rdg wit="#P">yāśanyāmuvuhi</rdg><rdg wit="#T">nyāsanyāmuhuhi</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"> <lem wit="#T">vvaya ta viku ri</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdZ #EdSSA">vyara ta vini ri</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#L #P">vyara ta vinuri</rdg>
. </app>
3025 <!-- 274122<P>PYñ 13.8: wyara ta winuri (r. wini ri? widu
.274123<P>ri?) saṇḍiṅ nī (r. niṅ?) maṅucap-ucap. -->
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">hana ta kili sake jro karvānāma vasanika</l>
3030 <l n="b">lakunira gaja līlāken keṅis təkapiṅ aṅin</l>
. <l n="c">hayunira kadin aṅgererehniṅ mukha maluṅid</l>
. <l n="d">mata lumiriṅ añəpñəp yan polah təka riṅ alis</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P">ta kili sake</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">ta sira kili sake</rdg><rdg wit="#T">sira kili saṅke</rdg></app>
3035 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">karvānāma</lem><rdg wit="#T">karvāma</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təkapiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">təkapiṅṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hayunira</lem><rdg wit="#T">hayunika</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">aṅgererehniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">aṅgerehrehniṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təka riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">təkapiṅṅ</rdg></app>
3040 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_13.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">saviji makuniṅ arjāsusv ahrit səḍəṅ aləmən</l>
. <l n="b">təṅah alurus ajambət mambət solah ira vagəd</l>
. <l n="c">təka hararas aveh kūṅ sahyāsoṅ jamaṅ anipis</l>
3045 <l n="d">riṅa-riṅanikuṅ ambək tan tuhvāni kaviratin</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">aləmən</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">aləməh</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">solah ira</lem><rdg wit="#T">polah ira</rdg></app>
3050 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">riṅa-riṅanikuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">riṅa-riṅanikāṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">kaviratin</lem><rdg wit="#L">kavirati</rdg><rdg wit="#T">kāvirati</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="14" met="kusumavilasita" xml:id="kakavin_14">
3055 <!-- <note type="prosody">+\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">rāmya parəṅ sirān laku paḍākavaca mirah aṅambvakən təṅah</l>
. <l n="b">mogha muṅup katon sadakirāputih anəlat i śeṣaniṅ jaṭā</l>
. <l n="c">ndan minahā lukar-lukar ikaṅ paṅisi tinigavarṇaniṅ putih</l>
3060 <l n="d">byaktani mūla-mūlanira ṅūni kaka-kaka sake daləm purī.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mūla-mūlanira</lem><rdg wit="#T">mula-mulanika</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">ṅūni</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. </listApp>
3065 <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">ṅkān dumunuṅ vulatnira rikaṅ yaśa kahanani saṅ dhanañjaya</l>
. <l n="b">kāṇḍəg i heṅ vulatnira manon lituhayu kadi deva manmatha</l>
. <l n="c">meraṅ ikaṅ manah kadaluruṅ lakunira ya ta hetuniṅ mara</l>
. <l n="d">sampətirānaput-naputi gātrani susunira mogha tan katon</l>
3070 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">i heṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ike</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">ya</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">gātrani</lem><rdg wit="#T">gātraniṅ</rdg></app>
3075 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">ñər ta manahnireki vəkasan kadi-kadi hana liṅsyaniṅ hiḍəp</l>
. <l n="b">hetuniran paśabda hana keraṅira masəmu harṣa tan vəḍar</l>
. <l n="c">rūmni vuvusnirāsəgə-səgəh tuna-tuna rasa tan təkeṅ hati</l>
3080 <l n="d">ndan ri halisniran kadi kilat ri mata katəmu deniṅ aṅrəṅə̄</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">liṅsya</lem><rdg wit="#T">leśya</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">hana</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
3085 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">rūmni</lem><rdg wit="#T">rūmniṅ</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təkeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">təke</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ndan ri</lem><rdg wit="#T">ndan riṅ</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">marma vuvusnira mpu kili yan sira kadi hana cihnaniṅ vruha</l>
. <l n="b">ndan paḍa meraṅ an vulat i saṅ vahu-vahu təka riṅ vanāśrama</l>
3090 <l n="c">byakta bhaṭāra manmatha savaṅ paja-pajanira saṅ hañar ḍatəṅ</l>
. <l n="d">ndan kadi buddhiniṅ lumihat iṅ haləsəs ika manahnire daləm</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ">meraṅ an</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">meraṅən</rdg><rdg wit="#T">meraṅ iṅ</rdg></app>
3095 <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təka riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ḍatəṅ i</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">byakta saṅ arjuneki ri hiḍəpnira ri hati nihan paṅavruha</l>
. <l n="b">rūpa lavan laras mvaṅ ikanaṅ makuṭa kavaca ratna taṅkulak</l>
3100 <l n="c">lāvan ikaṅ manis ya panəṅərnira kadi madhu yan vinəṅyakən</l>
. <l n="d">hetuniran patakvan irikaṅ parananira mataṅniran ḍatəṅ</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P #T">taṅkulak</lem><rdg wit="#L">taṅkulat</rdg></app>
3105 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">somya vuvus narendra mavalokana mavarah i doniran ḍatəṅ</l>
. <note>[arjuna]</note>
. <l n="b">“mahyun atīrtha riṅ vukir ameta patapana maṅiṣṭhy anugraha</l>
3110 <l n="c">“ātmaśarīraśoṣaṇa gəgə̄n ranakira ya ta hetuniṅ mara</l>
. <l n="d">pājarirāmanis duga-dugāṅinaki ri sira devatā kili</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P #T">ameta patapana</lem><rdg wit="#L">amet kapatapana</rdg></app>
3115 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #T">ātmaśarīraśoṣaṇa</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #P">hatma śarīra sokana</rdg><rdg wit="#L">atma śarīra śokana</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">ta</lem><rdg wit="#T" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">“ndah varahən ranaknira ri saṅ pinakaguru haneṅ vanāśrama</l>
3120 <l n="b">“lāvan ikaṅ vanāśrama ṅaranya ya ta pavarahe ṅhulun təmən</l>
. <l n="c">liṅ nr̥paputra mojar i siraṅ kili dadi mavarah satorasih</l>
. <note>[kili, “female ascetic”]</note>
. <l n="d">sojarire narendrasuta: “yeki kari vanavatī prakāśita</l>
. </lg>
3125 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">sojarire</lem><rdg wit="#T">sojar i saṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">“mvaṅ sira saṅ maṅanti pinakādiniṅ anaruka nora len vaneh</l>
3130 <l n="b">“śukla pavitra riṅ brata namaskara ṅaranira saṅ mahāyanī</l>
. <l n="c">rājavadhū kamūlanira ṅūni tuhu-tuhu mahāgave tapa</l>
. <l n="d">yeka dumehnikaṅ patapan adbhuta kadi puraniṅ surāpsarī.”</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3135 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ">rājavadhū kamūlanira</lem><rdg wit="#L #P">rājyavadū kamūlanira</rdg><rdg wit="#T">rājavadhū pva mūlanira</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">maṅkana liṅnira mpu kili saṅ saviji sira ta keməṅan lara</l>
. <l n="b">meraṅ ikaṅ manah ya ta nimittaniran ahaliṅan duniṅ saka</l>
3140 <l n="c">ndan hana ganya polahira ṅūni ri səḍəṅira ṅanti riṅ puri</l>
. <l n="d">śeṣanikaṅ lulut kabalunan ya ta mətu kadi kasturīṅ tutuk</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta keməṅan</lem><rdg wit="#T">tākāṇḍəhan</rdg></app>
3145 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">saṅ nr̥paputra yeka maṅucap sira saha guyu medəm aṅlare</l>
. <l n="b">gātranikaṅ payodhara maśeṣa ta ragət ika mātra tan ləbur</l>
. <l n="c">yeka sinindhi-sindhinira yan təlas anulus ireṅ kilīnira</l>
3150 <l n="d">ndan lumiriṅ midəm kadi mulat riṅ atapih apaciṅciṅ iṅ bañu</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta ragət</lem><rdg wit="#T">karagət </rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">sinindhi-sindhinira</lem><rdg wit="#T">sinindhinira </rdg></app>
3155 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">anulus ireṅ kilīnira</lem><rdg wit="#L">adulus ireṅ kilīnira</rdg><rdg wit="#T">ajalus ire kalīnira</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">tan huniṅan raras-raras i śabdanira kadi mahāgave lara</l>
. <l n="b">hetuniran parā tumama riṅ patapan i kahanan mahāyanī</l>
3160 <l n="c">denira devatā kili paḍāṅdulurakən i saṅ ārya phālguna</l>
. <l n="d">kagyat ikaṅ vatək viku kabeh tapa tapi kavəṅan tumon sira</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">kili</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
3165 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#T">kagyat ikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kagyata saṅ </rdg><rdg wit="#EdZ">kagyat (t)a saṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_14.12" n="12">
. <l n="a">ṅkāna rikaṅ pasevan ahaləp ya ta dunuṅaniran ginocara</l>
. <l n="b">saṅ rəṣi goravāṅaḍaṅakən phala hana bañu muṅgu riṅ tavik</l>
3170 <l n="c">lan sərəh arja riṅ pamucaṅan kinajaṅan ahaləp lavan madhu</l>
. <l n="d">somya səgəh-səgəh munivare sira mataña rikaṅ prayojana</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#T">munivare</lem><rdg wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">munivareṅ</rdg></app>
3175 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P #T">prayojana</lem><rdg wit="#L">prayojñana</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="15" met="viśvalalita" xml:id="kakavin_15">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
3180 <!-- (Skt vilāsinī) -->
. <!--<note>[Munivara, ‘excellent sage’, here: Mahāyanī]</note>-->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">“bapa mapa hetuniṅ nr̥pati yan ḍatəṅ hiṅ acala</l>
. <l n="b">“aməṅ-aməṅeṅ vanāśrama kunəṅ sabhāgya ta laki</l>
3185 <l n="c">“tapa-tapa tan gənəp təmu tahun ṅhulun cumaṭaka</l>
. <l n="d">“manaruka tapva yan təmu kadharmaniṅ kadi kita</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hetuniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">hetu saṅ</rdg></app>
3190 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdZ #L">ḍatəṅ hiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P">ḍatə̄ṅ iṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#EdSSA">ḍatəṅ ṅiṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#T">ḍatəṅ riṅṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">aməṅ-aməṅeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">aməṅame</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #T">tahun</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #P">tavun</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">cumaṭaka</lem><rdg wit="#T">cumaṭāka</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
3195 <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">“kunaṅ i ḍatəṅ narendra lumavad rikaṅ vanavatī</l>
. <l n="b">“kadi phalaniṅ tapā pinaraniṅ vvaṅ uttamaguṇa</l>
. <l n="c">“athava bhaṭāra śakra manurun kunəṅ kavəlasən</l>
. <l n="d">“riṅ atapa lot sahiṣṇu mamaṅan-gaṅan satumuvuh”</l>
3200 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P #T">tapā</lem><rdg wit="#EdZ">tapa (n)</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.03" n="3">
3205 <l n="a">vuvusira saṅ yatīndra mavalokanāṅupaśama</l>
. <l n="b">nr̥pasuta kepvan iṅ sahur apan kaduhkha virati</l>
. <l n="c">lara katikeka hetuni ḍatəṅniran paməṅ-aməṅ</l>
. <l n="d">ya tika nimittaniṅ mavacanātərəh saha taṅis</l>
. <note>[Arjuna]</note>
3210 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#T">kaduhkha</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta duhkha</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P">nimittaniṅ mavacanātərəh</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">nimitta riṅ mavacanātərəh</rdg><rdg wit="#T">nimitta riṅ mavācanātərəh</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
3215 <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">“praṇata ri jə̄ṅ munīndra huniṅan taṅisniṅ alara</l>
. <l n="b">“mavaraha riṅ kahīnan iki donya riṅ kadi sira</l>
. <l n="c">“karaṇa jugeka hetuni ḍatəṅ manəh munivara</l>
. <l n="d">“nr̥pati yudhiṣṭhireka kəna bañcane dyuta nita</l>
3220 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">taṅisniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">taṅis riṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P">bañcane dyuta nita</lem><rdg wit="#EdZ">bañcane dyutanika</rdg><rdg wit="#L #T">bañcaneṅ dyuta nita</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
3225 <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">“kanaka maṇik lavan pura təlas haneri pukulun</l>
. <l n="b">“ratu śatakoraveśvara ya duṣṭa tan sipi-sipi</l>
. <l n="c">“hana ri pakumbakan sira kabeh lavan munivara</l>
. <l n="d">“sira babuni ṅhulun sira tumūt kapāpa kaluṣa</l>
3230 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">pukulun</lem><rdg wit="#T">pukula</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">tumūt</lem><rdg wit="#T">tūmūt</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
3235 <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">“kunaṅ iki hetuniṅ təka rikiṅ vanāśramagiri</l>
. <l n="b">“inutus i pun yudhiṣṭhira mareṅ girīndraśikhara</l>
. <l n="c">“gumavaya siddhaniṅ tapa lavan bratekana gəgə̄n</l>
. <l n="d">“təhəra tan antukekana yadin tayāṅanumatā</l>
3240 </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">nahan ika liṅ narendra saha luh nirādrəs i pipi</l>
. <l n="b">paḍa kapiluh ta saṅ viku kabeh tumon kasiharəp</l>
. <l n="c">dadi sumahur ta saṅ rəṣi tumūt ta luhnira mijil</l>
3245 <l n="d">iraṅ i manahnireki dalihan musap sipatira</l>
. <!-- <note>[munivara]</note>-->
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kasiharəp</lem><rdg wit="#T">laranira</rdg></app>
3250 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ">tumūt ta</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tumūta</rdg><rdg wit="#T">tumūt pva</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">manahnireki</lem><rdg wit="#T">manahnireka</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">“kunaṅ iki pājaraṅkva ri bapaṅku mevəh atika</l>
3255 <l n="b">“tulusa hayunya riṅ sukha mamuktya tan kahavaran</l>
. <l n="c">“kunaṅ iki jātiniṅ hala hajəṅ paḍeki katəmu</l>
. <l n="d">“hayuni tapanta ṅūni kasəlan halāhayu tumut</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3260 <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mamuktya</lem><rdg wit="#T">mamukti</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#T">kahavaran</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kahavarā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">“mataṅ ika saṅ vatək viku paḍāharəp kaləpasən</l>
3265 <l n="b">“apan ikanaṅ gave hayu ṅaranya nora manulus</l>
. <l n="c">“hala hayuniṅ manah juga tumūt ta yāsili-silih</l>
. <l n="d">“paḍa maṅalap titahnya kətikaṅ janānvam atuha</l>
. </lg><!-- L atuhā -->
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3270 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta yāsili-silih</lem><rdg wit="#T">paḍāsilih asih</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kətikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">tikanaṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">“kadi hana taṅ vvaṅ uttama vənaṅ vinastu ləpasa</l>
3275 <l n="b">“viku sira səṅgahən ləpasa maṅkin evəh atika</l>
. <l n="c">“ratu sira vastunən ləpasa maṅkin evəh atika</l>
. <l n="d">“yadin i patinta tan vənaṅ akun ləpasnya tuduhən</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3280 <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P">maṅkin evəh atika</lem><rdg wit="#L">maṅkin evəh akā</rdg><rdg wit="#T">liṅnya mevəh atikā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">“kadi hana jāti nityaśa ṅaranya yāvat ahurip</l>
. <l n="b">“kadi hana tan kəneṅ mala ṅaranya yāvat ahurip</l>
3285 <l n="c">“kadi hananiṅ sinaṅśaya ṅaranya yāvat ahurip</l>
. <l n="d">“kadi hana tan kəne pati ṅaranya yāvat ahurip.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P">kəne</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #T">kəneṅ</rdg></app>
3290 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_15.12" n="12">
. <l n="a">“paməṅ-aməṅan tikaṅ sukha bhinukti yan vruh atika</l>
. <l n="b">“paməṅ-aməṅan tikaṅ guṇa pakarma yan vruh atika</l>
. <l n="c">“paməṅ-aməṅan tikaṅ nita pasaṅ yadin vruh atika</l>
3295 <l n="d">“paməṅ-aməṅan tikaṅ gati śarīra yan vruh atika</l>
. </lg><!-- important - line missing -->
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">paməṅ-aməṅan tikaṅ guṇa makarma yan vruh atika</lem><rdg wit="#T" cause="line_omission"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L">pakarma</lem><rdg wit="#EdZ">makarma</rdg><rdg wit="#P">pañarma</rdg></app>
3300 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">nita</lem><rdg wit="#T">niyata</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="16" met="citrālaya" xml:id="kakavin_16">
3305 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_16.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">“kavikun karatun pva ya paḍa mamusuh</l>
. <l n="b">“kavi vāni marūpa maguṇa mapirak</l>
. <l n="c">“hina dīna tivas yaya juga hamusuh</l>
3310 <l n="d">“añale cinale ya maṅucap inucap.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">dīna</lem><rdg wit="#T">dina</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">hamusuh</lem><rdg wit="#T">mamusuh</rdg></app>
3315 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_16.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">“sira saṅ karakət kapaṅanan irika</l>
. <l n="b">“hala tan katutur təmahan ika tivas</l>
. <l n="c">“si rajah si tamah təka ta ya maṅusī</l>
3320 <l n="d">“mamilət manəvək ri hati ya sumaput</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_16.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">“nr̥pa dharmasuta pva sira karakətan</l>
. <l n="b">“irikaṅ kabisan guṇanira manita</l>
3325 <l n="c">“təmahan ya binañcana kinira-kira</l>
. <l n="d">“inupāya pinet ri kahilaṅanira</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">inupāya</lem><rdg wit="#T">inupaya</rdg></app>
3330 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_16.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">“puput iṅ naya mevəh atika karatun</l>
. <l n="b">“vəkas iṅ guṇa sarvagata kira-kira</l>
. <l n="c">“sira saṅ marəkeki pilihana təhər</l>
3335 <l n="d">“tiga saṅ vvaṅ inuttama marəka təmən” </l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">pilihana</lem><rdg wit="#T">kapilihana</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
3340 <lg xml:id="kakavin_16.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">adavān vuvusən vacana munivara</l>
. <l n="b">sumurup taṅ aditya pətəṅ avun-avun</l>
. <l n="c">atəhər ta narendra makuləm i daləm</l>
. <l n="d">ndan ikaṅ mata tan kəjəp aṅaṅən-aṅən</l>
3345 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">taṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">hyaṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
3350 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="17" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="kakavin_17">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_17.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">sore kāla ḍavuh pisan siran amaṅkuk aṅaraṅ aṅəsah vimūrchita</l>
. <l n="b">lvir mukṣā humənəṅ maṅə̄ lali maturva hiḍəpira ri śirṇaniṅ hati</l>
3355 <l n="c">kāṅən dohnikaṅ uṅsirən lavan i tan kavənaṅa paṅutus yudhiṣṭhira</l>
. <l n="d">yāṅdagdhātəmahan taṅis kadi taṅisniṅ inalapan i tapvaniṅ gati</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#T">lali maturva</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">lalin aturva</rdg></app>
3360 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">kāṅən</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">kāṅen</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kavənaṅa</lem><rdg wit="#T">kavənaṅ i</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_17.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">ləṅləṅ saṅ nr̥paputra riṅ tvasira kepvaniṅ ulaha savaṅ kuraṅ tutur</l>
3365 <l n="b">aṅruṅkuk makəmul carik maṅiḍukus tan aharip apan ardha kātisan</l>
. <l n="c">ñəp-ñəp taṅ manah aṅgagap turida tan katəmu rasanikaṅ prayojana</l>
. <l n="d">deniṅ bhrānta kunaṅ dumehnira mataṅhi maṅən-aṅən i ṅelnikaṅ dadi</l>
. <note>[Arjuna] </note>
. </lg>
3370 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">maṅiḍukus</lem><rdg wit="#T">makidukus</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">aharip</lem><rdg wit="#T">aharīp</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P #T">prayojana</lem><rdg wit="#L">prayojñana</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mataṅhi maṅən-aṅən</lem><rdg wit="#T">mataṅiṅ maṅən-aṅə̄n</rdg></app>
3375 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_17.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">“yan vikvāku mapakṣa kəmbaṅ irikaṅ havan amarəki piṅgiriṅ nadī</l>
. <l n="b">“bhuktin tuṣṭaniṅ āṅaras pipi tamolaha riṅ asana kəmbaṅeṅ kapə̄</l>
. <l n="c">“tan tūteṅ vana śūnya mūḍhaniṅ aśoka ləvas inulah iṅ sadāgati</l>
3380 <l n="d">“enak ṅvaṅ maluyeṅ sabhānamun aṅuṅsira vəkas i liriṅniṅ aṅdyahi </l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kəmbaṅeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">kəmbaṅiṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#T">kapə̄</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">rahi</rdg></app>
3385 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P #T">tan tūteṅ</lem><rdg wit="#L">tan tut teṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">enak</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanak̄</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">sabhānamun</lem><rdg wit="#T">sabhā taman</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_17.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">“lāvan bāyu mapakṣan aṅlvaṅ iṅ iruṅ kahananika ri sandhiniṅ smr̥ti</l>
3390 <l n="b">“mvaṅ muṅgv iṅ təṅahiṅ vvaṅ adyah aməḍar tapih aṅəlih i kālaniṅ huyaṅ</l>
. <l n="c">“yan riṅ strī maṅisis gəluṅ katitihan kahariṅətən i sampuniṅ gati</l>
. <l n="d">“ṅhiṅ yan və̄tu riṅ ambəkan təmahanaṅkva ri səḍəṅ ika kenakan smarā </l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3395 <app loc="a">
. <lem type="emn">aṅlvaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdZ">aṅ(l)vaṅ(?)</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P #T">aṅvaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
3400 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">gəluṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ləguṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">və̄tu</lem><rdg wit="#T">vətva</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_17.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">liṅ saṅ pāṇḍusute daləm hati taṅeh laranira caritan davākəna</l>
3405 <l n="b">ñəp-ñəp rəp humənəṅ maṅardhana sireṅ hati vəkasan avā tikaṅ manah</l>
. <l n="c">kāṅən teki pakon munīndra ri sirān gumavayakəna siddhaniṅ tapa</l>
. <l n="d">yekān śirṇa halanikaṅ viṣaya hetuniran atutur iṅ prayojana </l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3410 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">teki</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">teka</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
3415 <lem wit="#T">sirān</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdZ">sira(n)</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">sira</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#L #P">sirā</rdg>
. </app>

. <lem type="emn">yekān śirṇa halanikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">yekānīrṇakəna lyaniṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#T">yekān śirṇa halenikaṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P #T">prayojana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">prayojñana</rdg>
3425 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_17.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">tatkālān umənəṅ sireki caritan surakili saṅ inuttameṅ hajəṅ</l>
. <l n="b">saṅ tuṅgal marikāṅaran gula vuluh saṅ araras inucap sakeṅ purī</l>
3430 <l n="c">ṅkā tekin hana śeṣaniṅ turida harṣanira ri siraṅ ārya phālguna</l>
. <l n="d">ṅūnī jro puri rakva yan sira sarāga saturida kakumbaṅeṅ jinəm</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">

. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="18" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="kakavin_18">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <!-- (jagatnatha) -->
3455 <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">təṅah vəṅi səḍəṅ kəjəpni paturūnira para kili riṅ bale təṅah</l>
. <l n="b">lavan tapa-tapī pasevan atunāguru kaki haturū haneṅ ləmah</l>
. <l n="c">dudū taṅ aturū hi sornikaṅ aśoka tapa-tapi lukar tapihnika</l>
. <l n="d">katon kadi rare vaneh kadi śirah vahu pinaras apan hañar viku </l>
3460 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">atunāguru</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">atunah guru</rdg>
3465 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">haturū</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">maturū</rdg>
. </app>
3470 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ri</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
3475 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">tapihnika</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">tapihnira</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#T">śirah</lem>
3480 <rdg wit="#EdSSA">śirāh</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#EdZ">sira(n)</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#L #P">sirā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
3485 <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">sira mpu kili mār tikaṅ hati vavaṅ təṅah aṅəlih apan kakiṅkiṅan</l>
. <l n="b">ya hetunira yan lumampah aṅamər laku ḍatəṅa ri saṅ nr̥pātmaja</l>
. <l n="c">anūt pətəṅ ikaṅ gaḍuṅ lumalay iṅ tarətəpan aṅadəg sirerika</l>
. <l n="d">tapihnira vavaṅ luse ri paṅagəmnira sərəh avalun jamaṅ kuniṅ </l>
3490 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təṅah</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">təñūh</rdg>
3495 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">laku</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">lalaku</rdg>
. </app>
3500 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">pətəṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pətəṅṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
3505 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">jamaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">jama</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.03" n="3">
3510 <l n="a">tan eraṅ ucapən yadin hana kumavruhana ri sira yan maliṅ raras</l>
. <l n="b">savetni paməvəhnikaṅ smara tan olya kavuyuṅana de mahāyanī</l>
. <l n="c">ri tan kavənaṅ iṅ lulut sinapihan puhara lara sumə̄k təke hati</l>
. <l n="d">ya hetuni jamaṅnire kaviratin tamahiran akukap kakandəlan </l>
. </lg>
3515 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #P">puhara lara</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">puvara lara</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">puhara la</rdg>
3520 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">tumindak i samīpaniṅ saka matūt hiriṅani kahanan dhanañjaya</l>
. <l n="b">rasāməkula deni kuṅnira vavaṅ marək asəmək anūṅakən səḍah</l>
3525 <l n="c">dhanañjaya vulatnirāciṅaṅ apan hana kavədi tumiṅhale sira</l>
. <l n="d">nimittanira tan humuṅ mavacanātəhər aṅisər apan parək dahat</l>
. <note>[arjuna] </note>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3530 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">rasāməkula</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #T">rasaməkula</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
3535 <lem wit="#EdZ #T">anūṅakən</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">anuṅhakən</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">vulatnirāciṅaṅ</lem>
3540 <rdg wit="#T">vulatniraciṅaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P #T">tumiṅhale</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">tumiṅhaleṃ</rdg>
3545 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mavacanātəhər</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mavacanatəhər</rdg>
. </app>
3550 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">“nini syapa siran ḍatəṅ ri kahanan ra putunira baṅun mamañcana</l>
. <l n="b">“huvus hila-hilā marək ri gati saṅhulun ataki-takī tapa brata</l>
. <l n="c">“paran karika piṅgiṅa mpu kili riṅ kadi sira viku śukla huttama</l>
3555 <l n="d">“sakeṅ viku mabhārya kevəh iṅ ulah bari-bari manalimpət iṅ hiḍəp.” </l>
. </lg><!-- L śukla huttama -->
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #T">gati</lem>
3560 <rdg wit="#P">gata</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ataki-takī</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ataki-taki</rdg>
3565 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">piṅgiṅa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">piṅiṅā</rdg>
. </app>
3570 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">na liṅ nr̥patiputra yeki sumahur ta saṅ ahayu savaṅ kilīṅ tulis</l>
. <note>[kili]</note>
. <l n="b">“tuhanku laki sugya tan vruha kite ṅhulun iki kavulanta ṅūny aku</l>
3575 <l n="c">“lanā pinakakāsih iṅ kadi kitānulus araras arūm priyambada</l>
. <l n="d">“ṅhulun ta tiki kesiniṅ nagara lāgi pinakasuvəṅ iṅ kinonəṅan” </l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
3580 <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">sugya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">sugyan</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">lanā pinakakāsih</lem>
3585 <rdg wit="#T">lana pinakākāsih</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta tiki kesiniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hulun teki riṅ</rdg>
3590 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">pinakasuvəṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">pinakasuveṅ</rdg>
. </app>
3595 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">raras-raras i raśmi-raśminira saṅ kili mavacana mār təkeṅ hati</l>
. <l n="b">mapolaha maśabda tuṅtuṅiṅ alisnira ta karika nūtakən liriṅ</l>
. <l n="c">mrəṅəs luṅid i dūnikaṅ mata rasāməgatakəna hatin kapaṇḍəṅa</l>
3600 <l n="d">tuhun gula vuluh panəṅgahira saṅ viku ri siran anorakən kilaṅ </l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mavacana</lem>
3605 <rdg wit="#T">mavacanā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təkeṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">təke</rdg>
3610 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mapolaha maśabda tuṅtuṅiṅ alisnira</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mapolahan aśabda tuṅtuṅi halisnira</rdg>
. </app>

. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">karika nūtakən</lem>

. </app>

3620 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">viku</lem>

3625 <rdg wit="#T">annorakən</rdg>
. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">samaṅkana nirūpa saṅ kili savaṅ səkar asana tibā sakeṅ gəluṅ</l>
3630 <l n="b">kusut-kusut ikaṅ payodharan inaṅsvakəniran umarək nr̥pātmaja</l>
. <l n="c">narendrasuta heva miṅsər aṅusap ləṅənira ri pagəhnikaṅ manah</l>
. <l n="d">ya hetuni vuvusnirāṅənək-ənək mapitutur ikaṅ enakeṅ sarāt</l>
. <!-- <note>[arjuna] </note> emend samaṅka kari?-->
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">“nini hyaṅ aparan ta hetuniṅ amuṅpaṅa turida katon tivasnika</l>
3655 <l n="b">“paranta ri kapaṅhiḍəpta nayaniṅ kadi sira viku yan pamet hala</l>
. <l n="c">“katuṅgalanikaṅ tinuṅgalakən iṅ hiḍəp inayu sinimpən iṅ manah</l>
. <l n="d">“ya tānulus anəmvakən kaviratin tapanira tuməmuṅ prayojana </l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">“sahiṣṇu muditā kasāttvikanikaṅ pamunahira ri gə̄ṅnikaṅ tamah</l>
. <l n="b">“si metri karuṇā kaśāntananikaṅ panapunira ri śaktiniṅ rajah</l>
3685 <l n="c">“huvus pva ya hilaṅ katon ta kəḍap iṅ manəmu-nəmu katəmvaniṅ hilaṅ</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">“kalīṅanika mevəh iṅ viku ṅaranya taki-takinikānuṅ enaka</l>

3710 <l n="c">“rajah ta viṣa bhasmi dohakən i śrəṅganiṅ acala kumambaṅeṅ pasir</l>
. <l n="d">“dalañcaṅ anipis hañut ri vəkasiṅ kilat aṅəḍap i mehaniṅ vəṅi” </l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_18.12" n="12">
. <l n="a">na liṅnira saṅ ārya phālguna maśabda mapitutur i sandhiniṅ licin</l>
3725 <l n="b">sira mpu kili kasrəpan humənəṅ epu laranira haluṅsuran taṅis</l>
. <l n="c">jamaṅnira kuniṅ mələs təkap i luhniran aṅapitu kālaniṅ kapat</l>
. <l n="d">kunaṅ hiḍəpire daləm hati samātran aṅinakana vr̥tta kampəta</l>

3750 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="19" met="navaharṣa" xml:id="kakavin_19">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_19.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">vəkasan sira saṅ kili mavacana somya riṅ ambək arūm</l>
. <note>[kili]</note>
3755 <l n="b">“laki saṅ nr̥paputra tuhu-tuhu vuvusta təmən rahayu</l>
. <l n="c">“ra tapīki katuhvaniṅ ulah amurug təkap iṅ viṣaya</l>
. <l n="d">“vulaṅun gatini ṅhulun iki bapa deni vəlasku tuhan”</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
3760 <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təmən</lem><rdg wit="#T">nəmən</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_19.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">adavān caritan sira kili paṅucapnira vah panaṅis</l>
. <l n="b">praṇa bhakti maṅañjali ta sira ri saṅ nr̥pa pāṇḍusuta</l>
3765 <l n="c">atəhər maṅadəg sira humənəṅ i dāyaniran muliha</l>
. <l n="d">i larisnira tan vavaṅ agəlis anolih asoṅ lara sih</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">humənəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">humənəṅṅ</rdg></app>
3770 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_19.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">irikā ta sirā nrəpasuta humənəṅ kadi candra malək</l>
. <l n="b">sumirir taṅ anīla kusuma tumibā taṅ aśoka marūm</l>
. <l n="c">muni taṅ taḍaharṣa kadi manaṅis eñjuh apet karuṇā</l>
3775 <l n="d">paṅuhuhni kuvoṅ paḍa humuni manuknya hanan pañiṭo</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_19.04" n="4">
3810 <l n="a">rahina pva mijil hyaṅ aruṇa sumənə̄ kadi citta lumə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="b">irikān paṅadəg nr̥pasuta mapuyəṅ sira tan paturū</l>
. <l n="c">ya dumehnira tan vavaṅ umarək i deni kəsəlniṅ avak</l>
. <l n="d">marahup sakarəṅ sira maśuci mamudra viśeṣa vidhi</l>

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="20" met="citrālaya" xml:id="kakavin_20">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_20.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">mamuhun ta saṅ ārya təlas iṅ arahup,</l>
3830 <l n="b">ri mahāmuni kapva kavəṅan umulat,</l>
. <l n="c">umijil sira riṅ gupura təlas adoh,</l>
. <l n="d">ulihiṅ lumivat lalu təka riṅ alas.</l>
. </lg><!-- changed kavnaṅ to kavṅan check trans -->

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_20.02" n="2">

. <l n="c">paṅətərni putərnya paḍa mavurahan,</l>

. <l n="c">vudiniṅ tumiliṅ mamarəki pahatan,</l>

. <l n="c">ri təpinya lumut-lumut ika mahijo,</l>
3880 <l n="d">padulurni pakuṅnya mamarəki vatu.</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_20.05" n="5">

3960 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="21" met="kusumavicitrā" xml:id="kakavin_21">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-\-+=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">atha ri huvusniṅ marahup atīrtha</l>
. <l n="b">lumaku sirātūt ri təpinikaṅ lvah</l>
3965 <l n="c">jaha kayu paṅgaṅ ri təpinikaṅ lvah</l>
. <l n="d">paḍa pukapūrug ləmah ika runtuh</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
3970 <lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">huvusniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">vuvusniṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">pukapūrug</lem>
3975 <rdg wit="#L">kapūrug təṅah</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">bañunika manduk ri təpi kavaṅsul,</l>
3980 <l n="b">gumuruh anəmpuh maṅənani vuṅkal,</l>
. <l n="c">makaparapal paṅniṅ asana kontal,</l>
. <l n="d">kahava təkapniṅ bañu gunuṅ adrəs.</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.03" n="3">
3985 <l n="a">hana bañu muñcar mətu saka riṅ roṅ</l>
. <l n="b">sumirat anəmbur maṅadəg anuṅgul</l>
. <l n="c">tuməḍun i roṅniṅ juraṅ aparaṅ groṅ</l>
. <l n="d">muni gumuruṅguṅ paraṅ ika sumoṅ</l>
. </lg>
3990 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#L #P #T">anuṅgul</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">anuṅguh</rdg>
. </app>

. </app>
. <app loc="d">
4000 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">paraṅ ika sumoṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ri paraṅ ika groṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.04" n="4">
4005 <l n="a">kalalu kapaṅgih lakunira səṅkan</l>
. <l n="b">kayunika məmbaṅ paḍa ya makəmbaṅ</l>
. <l n="c">paḍa ya makumbaṅ muni makabrə̄ṅə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="d">hana muni riṅ paṅ manuk ika gəṇḍiṅ</l>
. </lg>

. <app loc="a">

. <rdg wit="#T">kəmbaṅ</rdg>
. </app>

. <rdg wit="#T">ikanaṅ akumbaṅ brəṅəṅ aṅunin</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">riṅ</lem>

. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#L #P #T">gəṇḍiṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">gəṇḍeṅ</rdg>
4030 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">jalada ya məṇḍuṅ sumahab atimbun</l>
. <l n="b">gumuruh agəntər patər ika medi</l>
4035 <l n="c">riṅ alavas onəṅ kadi kəna rāga</l>
. <l n="d">kadi ta ya masyaṅ hamisiki karṇa</l>
. </lg><!-- onaṅ -->
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
4040 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">jalada ya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">jaladhara</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #T">sumahab</lem>
4045 <rdg wit="#L #P">rumahab</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#L #P">patər ika</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">patər yeka ika</rdg>
4050 <rdg wit="#T">patər rika</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kadi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">kavi</rdg>
4055 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hamisiki</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mimisiki</rdg>
. </app>
4060 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">nrəpatisutāṅlih lumaku kaləsvan</l>
. <l n="b">maṅadəg i sorniṅ kayu manis arja</l>
. <l n="c">haṅin ika madrəs kilat ika matruh</l>
4065 <l n="d">madulur alisyus camara muni syok</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">kalalu lumampah təka riṅ alas gə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="b">vahu təka moghaṅ riris alit akrəp</l>
4070 <l n="c">narapati maṅkin lumaku han aglis</l>
. <l n="d">payuṅira roniṅ kamumu ya malvā</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c">
4075 <lem wit="#T">han</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tan</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_21.08" n="8">
4080 <l n="a">təka ya ta sumyuk hudan ika madrəs</l>
. <l n="b">gumuruh agəntər kadi ta ya guntur</l>
. <l n="c">gəlap ika makrəp muni ya guməntər</l>
. <l n="d">kadi vəṅi taṅ rāt kalimutan andha</l>
. </lg>

4100 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="22" met="-+---+-+---+--+-=" xml:id="kakavin_22">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-=</note> -->
. <!--<div type="canto" rend="met" n="22" met="Atyaṣṭi group" xml:id="kakavin_22"> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_22.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">narendra kumətər manambiṅ irikaṅ variṅin magə̄ṅ</l>
4105 <l n="b">təhər makiḍukus kəmulnira mələs vəḍihan putih</l>
. <l n="c">linūd kinasut iṅ limut kadi kukus rumakət matis</l>
. <l n="d">rəsəp sumusup iṅ kulit kadi kanin ya təke hati</l>
. </lg>

. <lem wit="#T">manambiṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">manambəṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
4115 <lg xml:id="kakavin_22.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">narendra humənəṅ tatan vruh irikaṅ paranekihən</l>
. <l n="b">kadi pva pəjaheṅ tahən juga hiḍəpnira kapyuhan</l>
. <l n="c">lavan ta kumusuhnikaṅ bañu matūt ləbak iṅ gunuṅ</l>
. <l n="d">bənərnya tuməḍun mareṅ juraṅ arəs maṅiris hati</l>
4120 </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_22.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">lavan kasulayah tikaṅ kayu kabeh kapurug rəbah</l>
. <l n="b">rəmək ḍumavuh iṅ paraṅ kadi səpah təkap iṅ śilā</l>
. <l n="c">humuṅ ya gumuruh guməntər akətug təka riṅ laṅit</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_22.04" n="4">
4165 <l n="a">panasnya valiraṅ kukusnya sumələk təka miṇḍuhur</l>
. <l n="b">gəmut sahananiṅ tahən kadi tatal humilī katūt</l>
. <l n="c">linətnya malulun lavan kayu magə̄ṅ madulur vatu</l>
. <l n="d">maṅut ya ta tumūt lajarnya kapələk mati riṅ kəḍuṅ</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_22.05" n="5">
4185 <l n="a">samantaji tikaṅ hudan mari lavan pətəṅ iṅ laṅit</l>
. <l n="b">mavā sahananiṅ vukir paḍa katon kayuniṅ vana</l>
. <l n="c">asāt mari humuṅ tikaṅ lvah adaləm təka riṅ kəḍuṅ</l>
. <l n="d">tuhun kadi rinəkrəkan sukət ikaṅ kayu tan rəbah</l>

4245 <l n="c">tuvin kəsəl ikaṅ pupū ya ta dumehnira yan malon</l>

. <l n="c">pətuṅnya lumayah gəsiṅnya kaḍahut gumuliṅ sivak</l>

. <l n="c">kuvoṅnya humənəṅ kagə̄m kakətəran svaraniṅ valik</l>

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="23" met="tvaritagati" xml:id="kakavin_23">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
4290 <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">atha halivat nrəpatisuta,</l>
. <l n="b">katəmu tikaṅ vana kusuma,</l>
. <l n="c">papupulaniṅ kusuma matāp,</l>
. <l n="d">paḍa manəḍəṅ kusuma marūm,</l>
4295 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kusuma</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">masəkar</rdg>
4300 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">ravi sumurup laṅit akucəm,</l>
. <l n="b">pətəṅ alimut maṅada-hada,</l>
4305 <l n="c">kumucup ikaṅ səkar aluru,</l>
. <l n="d">təkapiṅ əbun rumarab atis,</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">kayu mavənəs mari kuməñar,</l>
4310 <l n="b">təkapiṅ aṅin sumirir alon,</l>
. <l n="c">asəpi tikaṅ vana kusuma,</l>
. <l n="d">manuk aturū mari ya muni.</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.04" n="4">
4315 <l n="a">ri vijil ikaṅ vulan avəlu,</l>
. <l n="b">manuluhi riṅ bhuvana kabeh,</l>
. <l n="c">vahu mapaḍaṅ tikanaṅ alas,</l>
. <l n="d">gunuṅ aruhur vahu ya katon.</l>
. </lg>

. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">vulan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">hulan</rdg>
. </app>
4325 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">nrəpati maṅel sira manusup,</l>
. <l n="b">ḍatəṅ i təṅahnikanaṅ alas,</l>
. <l n="c">ri vaṅinikaṅ kusuma katon,</l>
4330 <l n="d">paḍa tan avas katuduhana.</l>
. </lg>

. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">sahananikaṅ kayu majajar,</l>
. <l n="b">iniṅət-iṅət kadi ta vayaṅ</l>
. <l n="c">gagana mavā kəlir ikahən,</l>
4350 <l n="d">haṅin aṅudaṅ maṅulahakən.</l>
. </lg>

4360 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">kayu matatā paḍa mapupul,</l>
. <l n="b">hana mamisah kadi maturū,</l>
4365 <l n="c">kayu malurus paḍa maṅadəg,</l>
. <l n="d">hana gumuliṅ kadi sumare.</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">vatu humənəṅ kadi kavəṅan,</l>
4370 <l n="b">mənur aputih kadi muriṅis,</l>
. <l n="c">səkar amirah kadi gumuyu,</l>
. <l n="d">camara humuṅ kadi masurak.</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.09" n="9">
4375 <l n="a">vataṅ aguliṅ kadi maharip,</l>
. <l n="b">kayu mamilət kadi maməluk,</l>
. <l n="c">mragagah ikaṅ kayu makuvuṅ,</l>
. <l n="d">pinasukaniṅ luvak adulur.</l>
. </lg>

. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">anam-anamar kayu majajar,</l>
. <l n="b">kañiri putih kadi makrul,</l>
. <l n="c">kadi kinəsat kulit ikanaṅ,</l>
4395 <l n="d">kayu maləṅis paḍa katisan.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_23.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">iniṅət-iṅət mamuhara kuṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">kayunikanaṅ vana kusuma,</l>
4405 <l n="c">dadi maṅadəg sira sakarəṅ,</l>
. <l n="d">ri pətəṅ ikaṅ kayu rumahab.</l>
. </lg>

4415 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="24" met="rathoddhatā" xml:id="kakavin_24">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_24.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">saṅ hyaṅ candra mavā sira manəṅah,</l>
. <l n="b">maṅkin sə̄k tikanaṅ kusuma katon,</l>
4420 <l n="c">aṅhiṅ pakṣi munīṅ kayu maruhur,</l>
. <l n="d">vūt būt ḍok muni riṅ kuvuṅ abəluk.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
4425 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">manəṅah</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hanəṅah</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sə̄k</lem>
4430 <rdg wit="#T">sə̄h</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_24.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">rəs-rəsniṅ karəṅə̄ hamədi-mədi,</l>
4435 <l n="b">pyak-pyakniṅ kamanak muni madulur,</l>
. <l n="c">ṭok-ṭokan hana kiñjəṅ avurahan,</l>
. <l n="d">ṅūk-ṅūk ṅok svaraniṅ kuvuk apəluk.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
4440 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">rəs-rəsniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">rəs-rəsnnyān</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
4445 <lem wit="#P #L">hamədi-mədi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #T">mamədi-mədi</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ṭok-ṭokan</lem>
4450 <rdg wit="#T">ṭek-ṭekan</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ṅūk-ṅūk</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ṅūt-ṅūt</rdg>
4455 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#L #P #T">apəluk</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">avəluk</rdg>
. </app>
4460 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_24.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">sakvehniṅ sakaton mamuhara rəs,</l>
. <l n="b">paṇḍan voṅ binabad mati magəlar,</l>
. <l n="c">rantan rambat ikaṅ gaḍuṅ umure,</l>
4465 <l n="d">baṅ-baṅniṅ katirah paḍa ravayan.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P">mamuhara rəs</lem>
4470 <rdg wit="#L">mamuhara rəp</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">amuhara rəs</rdg>
. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_24.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">kandəl tvasnya tumūt milu kaḍavut,</l>
. <l n="b">kumbaṅ maṅhrəṅ i duryanika mati,</l>
4485 <l n="c">vok-vok jaṅgut i saṅ rəṣi rumave,</l>
. <l n="d">kaknyāṅanti ri paṅnikaṅ asana.</l>

. <l n="c">lvir pəṇḍəm vvad ikaṅ kayu sumiraṅ,</l>

. <l n="d">kəmbaṅniṅ taravarṣa kadi taṅan.</l>

4520 <lg xml:id="kakavin_24.07" n="7">

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="25" met="mr̥dukomala" xml:id="kakavin_25">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">tan ṅehniṅ sakaton paḍāmuhara rəs təkapnira manon</l>
4595 <l n="b">luṅhā lampahirāṅavetan aṅalor atūt alas agə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="c">ṅkāne kakrəpaniṅ səkar hana ta teja kādbhuta ṅadəg</l>
. <l n="d">lāvan sodamanīndracāpa mamilət prabhānya kuməñar</l>
. </lg>

. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">suṇḍul riṅ raviloka digdaha savaṅ sənə̄nya dumilah</l>
. <l n="b">saṅ hyaṅ lek makucəm kasənvan abirū kadi pva sumurup</l>
4620 <l n="c">lāvan puṣpa sumamburat jənu sugandha kasturi miṅiṅ</l>
. <l n="d">ndan devī makateja maṅkana dudugnya maṅhibəki rāt</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.03" n="3">
4635 <l n="a">hyaṅ-hyaṅniṅ pura miṅgat iṅ vəṅi siran haneṅ girivana</l>
. <l n="b">rīndraprastha ta rakva saṅkanira deva sūkṣmavanitā</l>
. <l n="c">miṅgat deni kadurnayān nrəpati pāṇḍavālah anita</l>
. <l n="d">hetunyān dadi rūkṣa taṅ pura hilaṅ təkap saṅ alalis</l>
. </lg>

4660 <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">yekā mār hati saṅ dhanañjaya manon surūpa yuvatī</l>
. <l n="b">hyaṅ śrī nora ta len hiḍəpnira tanora mānuṣa tuvi</l>
. <l n="c">lakṣmīniṅ pura katvaṅ iṅ ratu sinūkṣma nitya riṅ ati</l>
. <l n="d">yekān bhakti maṅastutī sira narendra yatnan umarək</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">“oṁ śrī ratnapurī nihan mara kabhaktini ṅhulun agə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="b">“nityāṅimpunakən ləbūni caraṇanta saṅ śriyamaya</l>
4690 <l n="c">“saṅ hyaṅ lot pinakātma sāriniṅ acintya nitya tinutur</l>
. <l n="d">“sūkṣmālit maganal panəmbah i manəhta yeki huniṅan”</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.06" n="6">

. <l n="b">“saṅkeṅ rājya vita ṅhulun munus avak ndatan kahuniṅan</l>
. <l n="c">“de saṅ pāṇḍava tan rumakṣa ri viśeṣa riṅ kadi kami</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">“vruh tākun kita saṅ dhanañjaya kinon mareṅ girivana</l>
4755 <l n="b">“metānugraha riṅ vukir gumavayaṅ tapabrata gəgə̄n</l>
. <l n="c">“atyanteki giraṅku dentanaku satya bhakti makaka</l>
. <l n="d">“astu hyaṅ kiraṭāṅanugrahanaṅ astrarāja ri kita</l>

4770 <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">“yan sampun kita siddha riṅ giri təkap bhaṭāra karaṇa</l>
. <l n="b">“ṅkā tākun maluyeṅ purinta muvaha ṅhulun hyaṅanikā</l>
. <l n="c">“rakṣa pvāku təkapta riṅ hayu maran rumakṣa ri kita</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_25.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">“vāhyādhyātmika taṅ tutur ya pahayunta hayva malupa</l>
. <l n="b">“maṅke mvaṅ ri patinta yeka ta pasāra-sārana tikā</l>
. <l n="c">“yapvan sāk ri yave daləm sahananiṅ musuh paravaśa</l>

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="26" met="drutavilambita" xml:id="kakavin_26">
4835 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-+\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">“hana musuh riṅ amet sukhaniṅ dadi</l>
. <l n="b">“daśamalādimalāmal alit mətu</l>
. <l n="c">“mala limāṅlali lolita met lara</l>
4840 <l n="d">“tamah anūt malulut si rajah tumūt</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="c"><lem wit="#P #T">mala limāṅlali</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L">malali maṅlali</rdg><rdg wit="#EdZ">malali maṅlali (mala limaṅ lali?)</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">“ya tumuvuh maṅikū rikanaṅ dadi</l>
4845 <l n="b">“dadi dadinya daridra lanāṅdasih</l>
. <l n="c">“daśamaleka mamukti matuṅgalan</l>
. <l n="d">“lara viyoga maganti magantuṅan</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
4850 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">dadinya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">dahinya</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
4855 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">lanāṅdasih</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">lanāṅdaśi</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #T">daśamaleka mamukti</lem>
4860 <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">daśamale tama mukti</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">“tiga tinūt ya dumehnya lulut tumūt</l>
4865 <l n="b">“ya dadiniṅ tiga tan sah ikāṅlare</l>
. <l n="c">“lara lapā laraniṅ viṣayāviṣa</l>
. <l n="d">“viṣa bisanya maveh laraniṅ dadi</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
4870 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #T">lulut tumūt</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">lulū tumūt</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
4875 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">lapā laraniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">lapāṅlaraniṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.04" n="4">
4880 <l n="a">“dadi tumūt satuvuh rikanaṅ dadi</l>
. <l n="b">“paḍa pəjah kətikaṅ mala kaśmala</l>
. <l n="c">“dadi təkeṅ mr̥ga pakṣi laṭāṅkura</l>
. <l n="d">“kala kaṭuṅka dumehnya kapātaka</l>
. </lg>
4885 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P">satuvuh rikanaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #T">satuvuhnikanaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
4890 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">kətikaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">ketikaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
4895 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">təkeṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">təke</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.05" n="5">
4900 <l n="a">“kapana taṅ mala kaśmala kaṇḍəha</l>
. <l n="b">“saha sakeṅ tiga niṣkala mantəna</l>
. <l n="c">“taha si maṅkin ikāṅ mala lot mətu</l>
. <l n="d">“avak ikaṅ tiga hetunikān tumūt</l>
. </lg>

. <rdg wit="#T">ikā malā</rdg>
4910 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">“tiga lanāməpəkiṅ sajagat kabeh</l>
. <l n="b">“tiga dumehnya kapāpanikeṅ sarāt</l>
4915 <l n="c">“tiga mamukti hajəṅ sukhaniṅ dadi</l>
. <l n="d">“tiga dumehnya lanāhuripiṅ dadi</l>
. </lg>

. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.07" n="7">
4925 <l n="a">hurip ikaṅ dadi māvak ikaṅ tamah</l>
. <l n="b">“tamah ikaṅ dadi tan varəg iṅ sukha</l>
. <l n="c">“sukha pinetnyan aṅel mahas iṅ paran</l>
. <l n="d">“parani saṅkanikaṅ dadi tan katon</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.08" n="8">

. <l n="c">“ya ta samar manasar manilib vulat</l>

. <l n="d">“sahananiṅ sakaton kahanan manon</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">“ndi parananta yadin ləpasekihən</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.12" n="12">
. <l n="a">“hana sireki vicakṣaṇa paṇḍita</l>
5005 <l n="b">“rva madulur maṅucap ta kamokṣakan</l>
. <l n="c">“saviji saṅ maharəp ləpaseṅ dadi</l>
. <l n="d">“saviji saṅ maharəp maluyeṅ dadi</l>
. </lg>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.13" n="13">
5010 <l n="a">“rasana teka vuvusnira tan salah</l>
. <l n="b">“paḍa ta vastunikaṅ kaharəpnika</l>
. <l n="c">“ndi kahananta yadin ləpaseṅ dadi</l>
. <l n="d">“ndi kahananta yadin maluyeṅ dadi</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.14" n="14">

. <l n="a">“kadi bavaṅ baṅ ikaṅ kinulit pinet</l>

. <l n="c">“tapa samādhi ya pūrṇama tan kalen</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.19" n="19">
. <l n="a">“mataṅ ikaṅ gavayən hayu tan madoh</l>

. <l n="c">“ya ta pamə̄ṅa huripta ya sādhana</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_26.20" n="20">
. <l n="a">“ləkasananta tikaṅ si ləkas təpət</l>

. <l n="d">“maran avas parananta məne ləpas</l>

. </div>
5135 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="27" met="toṭaka" xml:id="kakavin_27">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_27.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">“hana teki muvah pituturku rəṅə̄n</l>
. <l n="b">“si suyodhana motus amet ri kita</l>
5140 <l n="c">“ruməṅə̄ ri layat nr̥patin patapa</l>
. <l n="d">“ya nimittanikān paṅupāya hala</l>
. </lg>
. <!--<div type="interpolation">
.<app><lem wit="#T">
5145 <l n="a">“hanā rākṣa sarodrə kinon ikana</l>
. <l n="b">“ya mamātyana saṅ nrəpaputra jugā</l>
. <l n="c">“ya mataṅnya kitānaku yatna laki</l>
. <l n="d">“tuvin i bhaya māsku tatan kavənaṅ</l>
.</lem>
5150<note>This stanza is absent in all the manuscripts except #T and seems extraneous to our text.</note>
.</app>-->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_27.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">ri huvusnira mājar ikaṅ rahayu</l>
. <l n="b">dadi sūkṣma ta saṅ hyaṅ amiśra taya</l>
5155 <l n="c">nrəpaputra maṅañjali riṅ gagana</l>
. <l n="d">kadi riṅ svapəneki katonanira</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
5160 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ri huvusnira</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ri təlasnira</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P #T">rahayu</lem>
5165 <rdg wit="#L">rahahayu</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hyaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hyaṅṅ</rdg>
5170 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_27.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">ri huvusnira maṅkana yatna ta saṅ</l>
. <l n="b">nrəpaputra madan sira śīghra madəg</l>
5175 <l n="c">maṅalor sira tūt gunuṅ ardha sukət</l>
. <l n="d">kasasar kavave təpiniṅ vulusan</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d">
5180 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #T">vulusan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#P">hulusan</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_27.04" n="4">
5185 <l n="a">tasik arja ləyəp masamīpa gunuṅ</l>
. <l n="b">bañuniṅ giri sarvapavitra tumus</l>
. <l n="c">mapuput paḍa tīrtha ya konəṅ-unəṅ</l>
. <l n="d">humilī mahəniṅ lumajur maṅalor</l>
. </lg>

. <app loc="b">

. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_27.05" n="5">
5205 <l n="a">katəhak bañuniṅ tasik ardha ləṅəṅ</l>
. <l n="b">təkapiṅ bañu madrəs avah gumuruh</l>
. <l n="c">dinələṅ ri vəkasnya ləṅit kumusuh</l>
. <l n="d">kadi megha samar ya pətəṅ sumaput</l>
. </lg>
5210 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ardha ləṅəṅ</lem>
