. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_27.06" n="6">
5225 <l n="a">arunodaya sə̄ṅnya mabaṅ makuniṅ</l>
. <l n="b">mətu saṅka rikaṅ bañu rūpanika</l>
. <l n="c">kadi cakra murub mavəlu dumilah</l>
. <l n="d">sumurup ta bhaṭāra vulan makucəm</l>
. </lg>
5230 </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="28" met="navaharṣa" xml:id="kakavin_28">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">ya katon ləyəpiṅ pasir amuhara ləṅ-ləṅ anambəhi kuṅ,</l>
5235 <l n="b">kalavan gərəhiṅ patər akətər agəntər aṅanti rəməṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">ri pətuṅnya ñamut-ñamut aṅəḍapa mukṣa kilatnya tinon,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi mukṣa hiḍepniṅ umulat i vəkasnya ləṅit dinələ̄.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5240 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">gərəhiṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">#gərəh</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
5245 <lem wit="#P">pətuṅnya ñamut-ñamut aṅəḍapa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">pətuṅnya namut-namut aṅəḍapa</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#L">pətuṅnya ñamut-ñamut aṅəḍapi</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">təpinya ñamut-ñamut aṅəḍapi</rdg>
. </app>
5250 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">hana teki karaṅnya ri təṅah aṅadəg kadi nūṣa katon,</l>
. <l n="b">lagi mukṣa minukṣaniṅ alun aṅasut kadi reka samar,</l>
. <l n="c">kuməḍap kətikaṅ bañu maṅipak-ipak ri təpinya lanā,</l>
5255 <l n="d">mahirəṅ kadi kəmbaṅiṅ ahayu samar pinupur-pupuran.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">katon</lem>
5260 <rdg wit="#T">tinon</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">lagi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">kadi</rdg>
5265 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">reka</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">re</rdg>
. </app>
5270 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#P">kətikaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">katikaṅ</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">ketikaṅ</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">yyak ikaṅ</rdg>
5275 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #T">mahirəṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">airəṅ</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">haIrəṅ</rdg>
5280 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">hana nūṣa karaṅ liman asəmu ləyəp malaləh ya tinon</l>
. <l n="b">ika ganya parantiniṅ amati laṅə̄ lumabuh riṅ alun</l>
5285 <l n="c">makacihna parabnya suməlap i karaṅnya lavan ləpihan</l>
. <l n="d">hana kāri kasaṅnika kadi minahā ya sinampirakən</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
5290 <lem wit="#T">hana nūṣa karaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hanānuṅ makaraṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">malaləh</lem>
5295 <rdg wit="#T">malalə</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ika</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ikā</rdg>
5300 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sinampirakən</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">sinampirakər</rdg>
. </app>
5305 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">ri təpinya pasir-pasir agəlar i sor pasuṅiṅ piḍaḍa,</l>
. <l n="b">taritipni karaṅnya hana matəbalan mabavaṅ-bavaṅan,</l>
. <l n="c">harəmis makupaṅ-kupaṅ ahuvur-uvur makəraṅ matirəm</l>
5310 <l n="d">paṅisiṅni sahiṅ-sahiṅ ika madulur hana kampad ika</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">matəbalan</lem>
5315 <rdg wit="#T">mabu təbalan</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#L #P">ahuvur-uvur</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">ahuvuruvuṅ</rdg>
5320 <rdg wit="#T">ahuvur-uvu</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem type="emn">paṅisiṅni</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P #T">paṅisisni</rdg>
5325 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#T">madulur hana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">padulur dana</rdg>
. </app>
5330 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">ri parasnya paraṅ paruṅ aguha-guhā hana katkat ikā</l>
. <l n="b">hana pakṣi guruṇḍaya lagi masəsəh ya karaṅ-karaṅan</l>
. <l n="c">maṅaluṅ baḍavaṅnya ri təpi hana pās vayavak vuhaya,</l>
5335 <l n="d">kumələm savaneh hana kadi maṅuṅap ya mucul sakarəṅ.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aguha-guhā</lem>
5340 <rdg wit="#T">aguhā-guhā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#L #P #T">katkat ikā</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">katka tikā</rdg>
5345 </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">maṅuṅap</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">maṅucap</rdg>
. </app>
5350 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">sahaneṅ təpiniṅ pasir amuhara rāmya yadin caritan,</l>
. <l n="b">maṅavetan ikaṅ lakunira ta saṅ ārya matūt pasisi,</l>
. <l n="c">hana paṇḍan aṅuṅkuli paraṅan arəs ya tinon alaṅə̄,</l>
5355 <l n="d">pamilətni gaḍuṅnya maməkasi puḍaknya rurū kasirir.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ikaṅ</lem>
5360 <rdg wit="#T">ikā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">kasirir</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">kasisir</rdg>
5365 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">ri vəkasnya śilā śayana kayu manisnya maṅə̄bi matis,</l>
. <l n="b">kamuniṅ kayu teja mənur asana cāmpaka len surabhi,</l>
5370 <l n="c">kadi tāman apūrva ləyəpika maṅuṅkuli rāmya ləṅəṅ,</l>
. <l n="d">hana teki katon təkapira kadi deva samar tan avās.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c">
5375 <lem wit="#EdZ #P #L #T">apūrva</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">apūrṇa</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_28.08" n="8">
5380 <l n="a">hyaṅ anaṅga sireki haməṅ-aməṅ i deśanikaṅ vulusan</l>
. <l n="b">kalavan kalulutnira saṅ ahayu nora paḍeṅ amanis</l>
. <l n="c">sira saṅ dadiniṅ kusuma salaga nāma ratih vinuvus</l>
. <l n="d">dinulur sira deniṅ amaraduhitā pamuputniṅ arūm.</l>
. </lg>
5385 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #T">deśanikaṅ vulusan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">daśanikaṅ vulusan</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">deśanikaṅ hulusan</rdg>
5390 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdZ">paḍeṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P #T">maḍeṅ</rdg>
. </app>
5395 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">dadiniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">kadiniṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
5400 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">deniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">deniṅṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
5405 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="29" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="kakavin_29">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">səḍəṅnira bhaṭāra manmatha kapaṅgih aməṅ-aməṅ i deśaniṅ pasir,</l>
. <l n="b">təkap nrəpatiputra yekan atətəg sira ḍatəṅa ri saṅ manobhava,</l>
5410 <l n="c">ya hetunira yan paṅanti sakarəṅ maṅiṅətakən aliṇḍuṅan kayu,</l>
. <l n="d">sinoṅaniṅ aśoka ronya rumahab kahananira manon ndatan tinon.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
5415 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">atətəg</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">atəgəg</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ">manon ndatan</lem>
5420 <rdg wit="#L #P #T">manondatan</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">jəṅər tvasira saṅ dhanañjaya manon vvaṅ ahayu tuvi tan pasiṅsiṅan,</l>
5425 <l n="b">mukhanya gumavaṅ manisni pamatanyan alaris aluṅid liriṅnikā,</l>
. <l n="c">ləməsni paṅavaknya mambət aṅəlih lumaku-laku mapet raras hati,</l>
. <l n="d">tapihnya kasirir-sirir kadi mahā tinuna-tuna miṅis-miṅis katon.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5430 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kasirir-sirir</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">kasirir-sisir</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
5435 <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">apan yan ucapən rarasnyan apaṅus dalu hayunika tan kənenusīr,</l>
. <l n="b">luput pinahiḍəp tuneṅ aṅən-aṅən ləvu ñəñər ika yan tiniṅhalan,</l>
. <l n="c">muṅər kaputuṅan tikəl tanah iṅ aṅguritakəna hayunya riṅ karas.</l>
. <l n="d">mihat təmahan aṅlələh sahananiṅ lukis amaḍa-maḍā ya riṅ tulis.</l>
5440 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA">kənenusīr</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">kənenusī</rdg>
5445 <rdg wit="#P #T">kənenusi</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tuneṅ aṅən-aṅən</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">tunenaṅən-aṅə̄n</rdg>
5450 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#L #P #T">ñəñər</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">nener</rdg>
. </app>
5455 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">muṅər</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">muṅəṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
5460 <lem wit="#L #P #T">aṅguritakəna hayunya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">aṅguritakən hayunya</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mihat</lem>
5465 <rdg wit="#T">yayāṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">vaneh hayunikā manisnyan inapus təṅah ika tinulis bəbədnikā,</l>
5470 <l n="b">laṭinya mahirəṅ vajanya maputih ṭinika-ṭika huvəlnikaṅ gəluṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">matanya mabhirū təpinya malaris vahu kinəlabakən tikuṅ halis,</l>
. <l n="d">titir liniriṅan təkapniṅ alaṅə̄ lumaraṅi ya mapaṅruhun tika.</l>
. </lg><!-- L has ṭika, meaning changes? check -->
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5475 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA">mahirəṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">hhinirəṅ</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P #T">hinirəṅ</rdg>
. </app>
5480 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">maputih</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pinutih</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
5485 <lem wit="#L #T">mapaṅruhun</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">paṅruhun</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">pāṅruhun</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
5490 <lem wit="#EdSSA">tika</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #P #T">ṭikā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.05" n="5">
5495 <l n="a">paḍāṅalap ahur-huran səkar anəmpal asana mapayuṅ-payuṅ vuṅu,</l>
. <l n="b">savitnya katirah mənur ya tinatānya ri patah atajug-tajug səkar,</l>
. <l n="c">gəluṅnya kinusut-kusutnya minahā linuka-lukar inambət iṅ vuhəl,</l>
. <l n="d">mukhanya sinabuknya riṅ sarinikaṅ kusuma surabi maṅlare hati.</l>
. </lg>
5500 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vuhəl</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">huhəl</rdg>
. </app>
5505 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mukhanya sinabuknya riṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">guhanya maṇarah kayuṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
5510 <!-- Z sapayuṅpayuṅ (? not in transcript)-->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">ikaṅ saviji raśmi-raśminika yan gumuyu vaśavaśitva riṅ manis,</l>
. <l n="b">təkanya hapaṅus pilih tuha-tuhanya mamarahi mapet raras hati,</l>
. <l n="c">tuvin vvaṅ amanis hagaṅgaṅ anipis tahu viṣaniṅ akuṅ mamātyani,</l>
5515 <l n="d">titir pinakaśatruniṅ tapa lanā muruṅakəna samādhi saṅ viku.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">raśmi-raśminika</lem>
5520 <rdg wit="#L">rāśmi-rāśminaka</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#T">hagaṅgaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #P #L">mapañjaṅ</rdg>
5525 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P #L">tahu</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">tavu</rdg>
. </app>
5530 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">śilā śumayanā paliṅgihanikā paḍa maṅurayakən gəluṅ mələs,</l>
. <l n="b">vaneh ta ya matuṅtuṅan paḍa silih rəṅu maṅucap agoṣṭhi tan humuṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">hanāṅuvahi kenikāṅirabakən viru-viruni tapihnikenalih,</l>
5535 <l n="d">hanān kadi rare ndatan vavarəṅə̄ riṅ umulata ri polahiṅ katon.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#T">śumayanā</lem>
5540 <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">śumayana</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ta</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pva</rdg>
5545 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#T">tapihnikenalih</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tapihnya denalah</rdg>
. </app>
5550 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA">ri polahiṅ katon</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #P">ri polahe katon</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">sapolahe katon</rdg>
. </app>
5555 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">vaneh tiki mapet laṅə̄ gumuliṅ iṅ karaṅ arurub aśokapādapa,</l>
. <l n="b">ləṅəṅ lumihat iṅ pasir kadi mavor vəkas ika kalavan laṅit-laṅit,</l>
. <l n="c">ikāna ri təṅah katon kadi gunuṅ tikan alulun anambər aṅrubuṅ,</l>
5560 <l n="d">ya tekana tinonya ləṅ-ləṅ alaṅə̄ kadi kavi maṅikət palambaṅa.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vaneh tiki mapet</lem><rdg wit="#T">dudu tikiṅ apet</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aśokapādapa</lem><rdg wit="#T">aśokāpādapa</rdg></app>
5565 <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">lumihat</lem><rdg wit="#T">lumiyat</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">ikāna ri</lem><rdg wit="#L">ikan nari</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tikan alulun</lem><rdg wit="#L">tri kalulunan</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.09" n="9">
5570 <l n="a">vaneh tumuruniṅ pasir paḍa mapiṅkas aburu surud iryakiṅ bañu,</l>
. <l n="b">tumandaṅ aḍaḍap-ḍaḍap səminikaṅ kayu manis atəvək-təvək puḍak,</l>
. <l n="c">təkaṅ halun agə̄ṅ tumampuh aṅusī riya dadi ya tələs katūtutan,</l>
. <l n="d">tapih-tapih ikā ya tātanya katon kadi mukha masaput-saput jamaṅ.</l>
. </lg>
5575 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem type="norm">surud iryakiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">surudiṅ ryakiṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#L #P">surud yryakiṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#T">surud iryyakiṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#L #P #T">təkaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">tekaṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#T">dadi ya</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ta dadi</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">katūtutan</lem><rdg wit="#T">katamptəsan</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA">tātanya</lem><rdg wit="#L #P #T">tātuna</rdg></app>
5580 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">masaput-saput</lem><rdg wit="#T">maput-saput</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_29.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">kunaṅ sira bhaṭāra manmatha lavan kalulutiran aliṅgih iṅ śilā,</l>
. <l n="b">hanan kajənəkan sinaṅhuluni kāsihira saṅ araras kinaptyakən,</l>
5585 <l n="c">təhər kadi paluṅnikaṅ gaḍuṅ aṅol səkar amilət agantuṅan təṅah,</l>
. <l n="d">cucul vuhəl ikaṅ tapih təkap i paṅharas i taṅanirāṅgaməl susu.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">iran aliṅgih</lem><rdg wit="#L">ira liṅgih</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kinaptyakən</lem><rdg wit="#T">kinatyaṅan</rdg></app>
5590 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">təhər</lem><rdg wit="#T">amogha</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">paluṅnikaṅ gaḍuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">luṅguhiṅ gaḍuṅṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">amilət</lem><rdg wit="#T">avilət</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vuhəl</lem><rdg wit="#T">huhəl</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">i paṅharas</lem><rdg wit="#T">iṅ haras</rdg></app>
5595 </listApp>
. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="30" met="turidagati" xml:id="kakavin_30">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.01" n="1">
5600 <l n="a">ləṅəṅ alaləh tinon təpinikaṅ pasir amuhara ləṅləṅ iṅ mara,</l>
. <l n="b">kadi tinatā həninya matulis vinuri-vuri təkapnikaṅ surud,</l>
. <l n="c">hana lumarap katon kadi maṇik marakata kadi hintənāhulap,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi ta kuvuṅ-kuvuṅ sirat ikaṅ bañu kinəñar iṅ tejaniṅ ravi.</l>
. </lg>
5605 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ləṅəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ləṅə̄ṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">pasir</lem><rdg wit="#T">pasirr</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tinatā həninya</lem><rdg wit="#T">natā həniṅnya</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hana</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hintənāhulap</lem><rdg wit="#T">hintə̄nāhulap</rdg></app>
5610 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">iṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">i</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">kavəlas arəp huraṅnya mati kāsatən anəlati salvaniṅ karaṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">lagi pinaran titir təkap ikaṅ səmut adulur atūt pakis mure,</l>
5615 <l n="c">kamahuripən suṅutnya makədal katitisani paśeṣaniṅ bañu,</l>
. <l n="d">ikur-ikuriṅ paras paḍa ləvas hana mati kəna riṅ jariṅ-jariṅ.</l>
. </lg><!-- P kāsatan -->
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#P #L">salvaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">salvāniṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#T">salvaṅiṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
5620 <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">hana maputih katon ri təṅahiṅ pasir aṅəḍapi polahiṅ bañu,</l>
. <l n="b">layariṅ amañjiṅ asraṅ anəṅah kadi gila-gila mukṣa cət katon,</l>
. <l n="c">təkapiṅ aṅin lavan kusuh ikaṅ bañu maṅalun-alun maṅampuhan,</l>
. <l n="d">iniṅət-iṅət hilaṅ kahiḍəpanya sahaja tiki yan katon muvah.</l>
5625 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hana</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aṅəḍapi</lem><rdg wit="#T">āṅəḍapi</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#L #P #T">cət</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">cet</rdg></app>
5630 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">iniṅət-iṅət</lem><rdg wit="#T">iniṅət-hiṅət</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#L #P">kahiḍəpanya</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">kahiḍəpnya</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">hana ta muvah katon niyata rāmyaniṅ aṅañutan aṅhuvus-huvus,</l>
5635 <l n="b">kumiti-kitir kəlabni paṅavenya kapalipir i ḍuṅhus iṅ paraṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">lagi kasəpər karok lavan ikaṅ səkar asana tibeṅ karaṅ taṅan,</l>
. <l n="d">hana ta muvah katon pilih-pilih bhanava rusak aṅaṇḍas iṅ karaṅ.</l>
. </lg><!-- P correction rāmva to rāmya but porbably added later -->
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5640 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hana</lem><rdg wit="#T">anā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA">rāmyaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#L #P">rāmvaniṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#T">rāmvaniṅṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#L #P #T">aṅañutan</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">aṅanutan hana</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kumiti-kitir</lem><rdg wit="#L">kumiti-kiti</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">paraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">karaṅ</rdg></app>
5645 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">karaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#L">taraṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hana</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">sahananikaṅ katon paḍa maveh turida ri manahiṅ vvaṅ aṅləṅəṅ,</l>
5650 <l n="b">nrəpasuta kepvaniṅ gati taṅeh manahira ḍatəṅe prayojana,</l>
. <l n="c">kajənəkaneṅ laṅə̄ təvas aṅel karakətana ri rāmyaniṅ pasir,</l>
. <l n="d">dadi humənəṅ sirāṅaṅən-aṅən ḍatəṅanira ri saṅ manobhava.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5655 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">katon paḍa maveh</lem><rdg wit="#T">katiṅhalan aveh</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">vvaṅ aṅləṅəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ṅvaṅṅ aṅləṅə̄ṅ </rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">ḍatəṅe prayojana</lem><rdg wit="#L">ḍatəṅeṅ prayojñana</rdg><rdg wit="#T">ḍatəṅeṅ prayojanā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kajənəkaneṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">jənəkəneṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">aṅel</lem><rdg wit="#T">haṅel</rdg></app>
5660 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">sirāṅaṅən-aṅən</lem><rdg wit="#T">sirāṅaṅən-haṅən</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">dadi nrəpaputra śīghra maṅadəg ḍatəṅa ri kahanan manobhava,</l>
. <l n="b">mavaraha doniran ḍatəṅa riṅ vukir agavaya siddhaniṅ tapa,</l>
5665 <l n="c">karaṇaniran ḍatəṅ ri kahanan manasija tumuluy maṅastuti,</l>
. <l n="d">dadi sira saṅ manobhava sumambut i luṅayani saṅ dhanañjaya.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">dadi</lem><rdg wit="#T">rikā</rdg></app>
5670 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">śīghra</lem><rdg wit="#T">śighrā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">agavaya</lem><rdg wit="#T">ahagavayā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">karaṇaniran ḍatəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">karaṇnaniran hunuṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">manasija</lem><rdg wit="#T">manasijā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">maṅastuti</lem><rdg wit="#T">maṅastutti</rdg></app>
5675 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">manobhava sumambut i</lem><rdg wit="#T">manobhavā sumambutt iṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">luṅayani</lem><rdg wit="#T">luṅayaniṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">uḍuh arini ṅhulun laki sabhāgya ta kita mapa taṅ prayojana,</l>
5680 <l n="b">aməṅ-aməṅeṅ pasir karika saṅ nrəpati kadi mahā mapet laṅə̄,</l>
. <l n="c">amarəṅi rāmyaniṅ masa kapat lumihatana ri rāmyaniṅ pasir,</l>
. <l n="d">iṅət-iṅətən ta rāmyani pasirnya guritakəna de nrəpātmaja,</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5685 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">arini ṅhulun</lem><rdg wit="#T">ariniṅ ṅulun</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">prayojana</lem><rdg wit="#L">prayojñana</rdg><rdg wit="#T">prayojñanā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">aməṅ-aməṅeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">aməṅṅ-aməṅeṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">amarəṅi</lem><rdg wit="#T">amarəṅiṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">masa</lem><rdg wit="#T">masā</rdg></app>
5690 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ">lumihatana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">lumiyat ana</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">lumihattana</rdg>
. </app>
5695 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">iṅət-iṅətən ta</lem><rdg wit="#T">hiniṅətt-iṅət ta</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">rāmyani</lem><rdg wit="#T">rāmyaniṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_30.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">vuvusira saṅ manobhava saharṣa ṅuniyuni tikaṅ surāṅganā,</l>
5700 <l n="b">nrəpasuta mājariṅ gati ri donanira yan inutusni saṅ kaka,</l>
. <l n="c">luməkasa maṅhyaṅeṅ giri sumeru gumavayakənaṅ tapa brata,</l>
. <l n="d">mvaṅ i kahilaṅniran kəna binañcana ya ta pavarahnirātəhər.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5705 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">manobhava</lem><rdg wit="#T">manobhavā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">nrəpasuta mājariṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">nrəpasutta majari</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">donanira</lem><rdg wit="#T">donanirā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">inutusni saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">inūtusnikaṅ</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">binañcana</lem><rdg wit="#T">binñcana</rdg></app>
5710 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta</lem><rdg wit="#T">ṭā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
. <!-- 785 -->
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="31" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="kakavin_31">
5715 <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
. <!-- metrical problem: 19th is short -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">saṅ hyaṅ kāma sireki śīghra sumahur milu malara manahnirāṅrəṅə̄,</l>
. <l n="b">maṅka pvāku nimittaniṅ ḍatəṅa riṅ giri gumavaya yoga len brata,</l>
5720 <l n="c">antənku ndya taṅ enakeki vuvusaṅkva ri kita bapa yogya rakṣanən,</l>
. <l n="d">āpan mevəh ikaṅ guṇāmaraha riṅ hayu maṅinakaneṅ vvaṅ aṅrəṅə̄.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P #T">sumahur</lem><rdg wit="#L">sumavur</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">pvāku</lem><rdg wit="#T">kapva</rdg></app>
5725 <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ndya</lem><rdg wit="#T">nya</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">kita</lem><rdg wit="#T">kitthā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ikaṅ guṇāmaraha riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ika guṇnamaraha riṅṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.02" n="2">
5730 <l n="a">vyarthaṅ vvaṅ yan amuktya tan vruha ri mūlaniṅ anəmu sukhādi vīryavān,</l>
. <l n="b">nirvaṅ vvaṅ matuduh maṅə̄ ya tan akīrtya tuladana təkapniṅ aṅləṅəṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">tan rāmyā maśarīra tan tulusa rūpa lituhayu vicakṣaṇāguṇa,</l>
. <l n="d">nirdon ṅ vvaṅ viku tan vənaṅ tulusa paṇḍita magavaya dharmasādhana.</l>
. </lg><!-- note rāmāyā instead of rāmyān -->
5735 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ">vyarthaṅ vvaṅ</lem>

. </app>

. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P">akīrtya tuladana</lem>

. </app>

. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">aṅləṅəṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">āləṅə̄</rdg>

. <rdg wit="#T">rāmyā maśarira</rdg>
. </app>
5765 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdZ">nirdon ṅ vvaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P #T">nirdon ṅvaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
5770 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">dharmasādhana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">dharmmāsādhanā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.03" n="3">
5775 <l n="a">akveh vvaṅ lumicin sumamyak aṅucap manayakən i rusitniṅ akṣara,</l>
. <l n="b">liṅnyājy ājamujit ndatan vruh i vənaṅnika kadi laghənāsavit səkar,</l>
. <l n="c">vyaktinyānuparəṅga bhūṣaṇa vuvusnira mətu kadi luṅgahiṅ gaḍuṅ,</l>
. <l n="d">ndan sūkṣmeki ləkasniran kadi tulis carita cinaritanya tan katon.</l>
. </lg>
5780 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">vənaṅnika</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">vənaṅnikā</rdg>
. </app>
5785 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">vyaktinyānuparəṅga bhūṣaṇa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">vyaktinyānuparəṅgā bhuṣāṇa</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
5790 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">cinaritanya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">cinaritanyā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.04" n="4">
5795 <l n="a">aṅhiṅ svarga jugā pinet paḍa mahur-huran aharəp amuktya riṅ sarāt,</l>
. <l n="b">rāmyāniṅ mahulun mamās marabi yeka ta karaṇanikān mahas maṅel,</l>
. <l n="c">tan vruh yan kadi robnikaṅ jaladhi tan təhəra katəmu jātiniṅ sukha,</l>
. <l n="d">tan meṅət pva ya mūdha tan vruh i pamuktyanika sinaput iṅ rajah tamah.</l>
. </lg>
5800 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">svarga</lem><rdg wit="#T">svarggā</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ">riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#L">tiṃ</rdg><rdg wit="#P">taṅ</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">karaṇanikān</lem><rdg wit="#T">karaṇānikān</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">tr̥ṣṇāgə̄ṅ mamilət ri saṅ manəmu bhoga karakət ika yan tinam-taman,</l>
. <l n="b">tan mantuk purihiṅ śarīra katələr təkap i paṅapuy iṅ malendriya,</l>
. <l n="c">kaṇḍəh deni kaśaktiniṅ daśamalāṅrurah aṅadəhi polahiṅ tiga,</l>
5805 <l n="d">tan dvekān tumuvuh muvah mətu cirinyan ahala mijil iṅ daśendriya.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">katələr</lem>
5810 <rdg wit="#T">kadurus</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #T">daśamalāṅrurah</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #P">daśamalārurah</rdg>
5815 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#T">dvekān</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">dva pvaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
5820 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">mijil</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #T">vijil</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
5825 <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">mevəh saṅ vruhi mūlaniṅ dadi padum ya hala hayu tinūtnya yan titah,</l>
. <l n="b">lāvan saṅ vənaṅ ekacitta ri səḍəṅni patinira matiṅgaleṅ kriya,</l>
. <l n="c">yuktinyan pasilih-silih gatinikaṅ hurip i hananikaṅ pamuktyana,</l>
. <l n="d">tan tyāgā lumicin-licin ri hananiṅ tiga turuṅ apasah sakeṅ avak.</l>
5830 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">matiṅgaleṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">matiṅgale</rdg>
5835 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">yuktinyan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">vyaktinyān</rdg>
. </app>
5840 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hananikaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hananiṅkiṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
5845 <lem wit="#EdZ #EdSSA #L #P">ri hananiṅ tiga</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">rahananataga</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.07" n="7">
5850 <l n="a">dharmādhyakṣani saṅ caturjana ta saṅ ratu kumavaśakən jagattraya,</l>
. <l n="b">yan sāmpun sira riṅ śivāgama rumakṣa hayunira saṅ ārya paṇḍita,</l>
. <l n="c">lāvan yan vruh i mūlaniṅ bhuvana vastuniṅ atapa masādhya śūnyatā,</l>
. <l n="d">ṅke riṅ rājya paḍeki dharma patapan gatinika makabhuktya taṅ sarāt</l>
. </lg>
5855 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #P">kumavaśakən</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #T">kumavasakən</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">kumavaśākən</rdg>
5860 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem type="emn">masādhya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">mayajña</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">masādhyā</rdg>
5865 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">nā liṅ saṅ hyaṅ anaṅga yeki sumahur nrəpatanaya saharṣa taṅ manah,</l>
. <l n="b">āpan yeki nimittani ṅhulun ameta patapana maṅiṣṭy anugraha,</l>
5870 <l n="c">mahyun paṅgiha seṣṭiniṅ ratu vənaṅ gumavayakəna dharmasādhana,</l>
. <l n="d">yan labdhāvara de manəh kusumacāpa təkapira bhaṭāra śaṅkara.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
5875 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">yeki sumahur</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">yeki sumavur</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">yeka sumahur</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
5880 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mahyun paṅgiha</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdZ">mahyun n paṅgiha</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">mahyun maṅgiha</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
5885 <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">śrī dvaipāyana teki saṅ paranani ṅhulun avaraha riṅ śivāgama,</l>
. <l n="b">mvaṅ tekaṅ vukir indrakīla kahananya ya ta pavarahe ṅhulun təmən</l>
. <l n="c">lāvan yan hana sambhavāṅavara donanika ya tika pājare ṅhulun,</l>
. <l n="d">saṅ hyaṅ māsiha ri ṅhulun tumulusāvaraha ri kahanan mahāmuni.</l>
5890 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">paranani</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pinarani</rdg>
5895 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">donanika</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">donanikā</rdg>
. </app>
5900 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">liṅ saṅ pārtha maṅakṣamāṅasih-asih mamalaku vinarah riṅ iṅgita,</l>
. <l n="b">lāvan dohnikaṅ indraparvata sakeṅ kahanan i patapan mahāmuni,</l>
. <l n="c">yekan śīghra bhaṭāra kāma mavarah ri kahananikaṅ indraparvata,</l>
5905 <l n="d">vetan deśanikā mənər kadi bahitra kumurəb ahirəṅ magə̄ṅ katon.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">sakeṅ</lem>
5910 <rdg wit="#T">sake</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_31.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">lor vetan sakariṅ girīndra hana pājaran arəcəp apūrva riṅ haləp,</l>
5915 <l n="b">śrī dvaipāyana saṅ maṅanti pinakādi sinamayanira hyaṅ īśvara,</l>
. <l n="c">yogyānuṅ dunuṅən pavitra paraniṅ kadi kita gumave parikrama,</l>
. <l n="d">tan vvaṅ len sira de nrəpātmaja vənaṅ mavaraha sira riṅ śivāgama.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
5920 <app loc="c">
. <lem type="emn">parikrama</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">parakrama</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">tapa brata</rdg>
. </app>
5925 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">vənaṅ mavaraha sira</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">tuhun mavaraha sira</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">vənaṅ sira mavaraha</rdg>
. </app></listApp>
5930 </div>
.
. <!-- 788 -->
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="32" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="kakavin_32">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+++\-++\-=</note> -->
5935 <lg xml:id="kakavin_32.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">vvantən rākṣasa murka śiṣyanira dug durgā bhaṭārīśvarī,</l>
. <l n="b">ndan tatkālaniran pamet ri təmahan saṅ hyaṅ gaṇan paṅdadi</l>
. <l n="c">saṅke krodhanirāṅuhuh pəpət ikaṅ brahmāṇḍa kāṇḍəg sivak,</l>
. <l n="d">ṅkā tekān umijil sake liḍahirākrak ghurṇitaṅ rāt kabeh.</l>
5940 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">dug</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">duk</rdg>
. </app>
5945 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">krodhanirāṅuhuh</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">krodhanirāṅuvuh</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
5950 <lg xml:id="kakavin_32.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">ndān sampun makanāma saṅ nalamala khyātīṅ jagat digjaya,</l>
. <l n="b">tan mātya pva ya deniṅ astra ṅuniveh deniṅ surāṅgādhipa,</l>
. <l n="c">mvaṅ vyāghrāsurasiṅha len kala piśācā mr̥tyu siṅ kādbhuta,</l>
. <l n="d">tan deniṅ ratu śaktimān ṅuniyunī yakṣāgni len kiṅkara.</l>
5955 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ndān sampun makanāma</lem>

5960 </app>
. <app loc="b">

. <rdg wit="#T">māti</rdg>

5970 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">siṅ kādbhuta</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">sarvādbhuta</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdZ">ṅuniyunī</lem>
5975 <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L">ṅuniṅuni</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">ṅuniṅunī</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">ṅuniṅūnī</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
5980 <lg xml:id="kakavin_32.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">ṅūnī tattvanikaṅ kaśaktini kiteṅ rāt yan pamatyaṅ kala,</l>
. <l n="b">sakvehniṅ kulavarga dānava kabeh śīrṇā ya denteṅ jagat,</l>
. <l n="c">yeka krodha ta yāṅrəṅə̄ ri kahanantan śakti vānīṅ kala,</l>
. <l n="d">yekā mahyun aṅadva śakti kalavan rakryan hələm riṅ kali.</l>
5985 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P">ṅūnī</lem>

. </app>

. <app loc="d">

6005 <rdg wit="#T">ri</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_32.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">ndān devī sira saṅ mataṅguh iriyan tan vətva riṅ dvāpara,</l>
6010 <l n="b">ṅhiṅ yan riṅ kali yeki yan mijila saṅkeṅ śūnyatā liṅnira,</l>
. <l n="c">hetunyan humənəṅ sahiṣṇu sakarəṅ maṅher təkāniṅ kali,</l>
. <l n="d">byaktan vətva hələm ri kālani madantāmatyanārinta ya.</l>
. </lg>

. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="33" met="rajanī" xml:id="kakavin_33">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.01" n="1">
6045 <l n="a">si nalamalā təhər tiga śirahnya paḍāsavala,</l>
. <l n="b">ikaṅ i təṅən khagādhipa śirahnya ya tulya gəlap,</l>
. <l n="c">ikaṅ i kivan liman kadi bhaṭāra gaṇan paṅuhuh,</l>
. <l n="d">ikaṅ i təṅah kalāṅamah-amah kadi siṅha jaya.</l>
. </lg>
6050 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">paḍāsavala</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">paḍasavala</rdg>
. </app>
6055 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">khagādhipa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">bhagādhipa</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
6060 <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">liman</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">paṅuhuh</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">paṅuhah</rdg>
6065 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">avak ahirəṅ magə̄ṅ kadi gunuṅ sinusun maruhur,</l>
. <l n="b">mata kadi sūrya yan vətu mabaṅ dumilah mapanas,</l>
6070 <l n="c">latu-latu kādbhutākrəp ahirəṅ ta halisnya sukət,</l>
. <l n="d">vivaranikaṅ hiruṅ kadi guhā paḍa bhīṣaṇa ya.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
6075 <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">yan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">ya</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.03" n="3">
6080 <l n="a">kadi bəlahiṅ ləmah tutuk ikān umaṅaṅ malapā,</l>
. <l n="b">maṅalad-alad liḍahnya kadi bahni murub dumilah,</l>
. <l n="c">silih alivat siyuṅnya kadi cāpa surādhipa ya,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi bañuniṅ kavah pila-pilūnya mabo mahaṅi.</l>
. </lg>

. <app loc="a">

. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">kumis arave-rave kadi ḍukut sukətiṅ pasisī,</l>
6105 <l n="b">kadi bəlahiṅ paraṅ paruṅ ikaṅ mukha tulya karaṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">kadi layariṅ baluk limaṅ atus taliṅanya katon,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi pusəriṅ pasir lyaṅ i kapə̄nya pəṅuṅ madaləm.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">kadi jaladākəlin kələn atə̄b tika romanika,</l>
. <l n="b">kadi siluk iṅ pasir duni mukhanya karal-karalən,</l>
6125 <l n="c">yar aṅən-aṅən riyaṅ vvaṅ umaras kumətər tan aris,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi ta bhaṭāra rudra ri səḍəṅnira nrəṣṭi jagat.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">gaganacarāṅlayaṅ kadi ta vāhana rūpanikā,</l>
. <l n="b">vənaṅ aḍəmit hanan vənaṅ agə̄ṅ ya sakahyunikā,</l>
6150 <l n="c">kadi ta gərəh svaranya karəṅə̄ prakaṭā gumuruh,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi ta ya rāvaṇāṅamah-amah ri bhaṭāra hari.</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">hana ri tələṅnikaṅ jaladhi yeka dumeh ya taya,</l>
6165 <l n="b">sahana-haneṅ tasik ya pinaranya tatan matakut,</l>
. <l n="c">ri punuk ikaṅ karaṅ bhujaga yeka parantinikā,</l>
. <l n="d">ya tika dumeh ya tan hana kapaṅgiha de nrəpati.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.08" n="8">
6185 <l n="a">kunaṅ iki tattvabhūtanika yan hilaṅeṅ samara,</l>
. <l n="b">hana luṅid iṅ śivasmr̥ti vajanya ya cintamaṇi,</l>
. <l n="c">niyata matīriyāṅduki səḍəṅniṅ aṅuñci pəpət,</l>
. <l n="d">hana panulak-tulak tala ṅaranya vənaṅ paṅalah.</l>
. </lg>

6195 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">niyata hilaṅnya deniṅ asamādhi ya cintamaṇi,</l>
. <l n="b">apan ika śatruniṅ tapa musuhniṅ asādhya hayu,</l>
. <l n="c">hana ri havakta tan hana vaneh tikaṅ astra ləvih,</l>
6200 <l n="d">iṅət-iṅətən ta de nrəpati kottamaniṅ vinuvus.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">kunaṅ i mənenya yan ḍatəṅ ahayva ta saṅ nrəpati,</l>
. <l n="b">palə-paləh iṅ musuh ləkasi hayva tatan matihaṅ,</l>
6215 <l n="c">kami muliheṅ surālaya lavan suraratnavadhū,</l>
. <l n="d">nahan ika pājariṅ smara parəṅ sira mūr adulur.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">asəpi ta saṅ nrəpātmaja ri kārinireṅ pasisī,</l>
. <l n="b">humənəṅ ikaṅ mayūra kadi rovaṅiran paṅaraṅ,</l>
6235 <l n="c">səkar aluñut haneṅ vatu lavan ləpihan katəmu,</l>
. <l n="d">vinaca vijīnya bhāṣa kakavin ya turuṅ sayati.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.12" n="12">
. <l n="a">ya ta paməkasnikaṅ suravadhū pavilāśa ləṅəṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">ri təpinikaṅ samudra kahananyan amukti laṅə̄,</l>
6255 <l n="c">hana ta puḍak turuṅ tulus isinya ṭikā satugəl,</l>
. <l n="d">kalavan ikaṅ saḍak gaḍiṅ i sornya pilih panulis.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.13" n="13">
. <l n="a">kavəlas arəp səkarnya kasirir tumibeṅ pasisī,</l>
6270 <l n="b">milu mavənəs gaḍuṅnika lume hana riṅ paraṅan,</l>
. <l n="c">hana ta səkar pilih paṅuliṅanya mapet kalaṅə̄n,</l>
. <l n="d">paṅisi tibeṅ karaṅ lavan ikaṅ maṅunəṅ maluñut.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.14" n="14">
. <l n="a">asana ləvas lavə̄nya kadi cihna rakət ri pipi,</l>
6290 <l n="b">kalavanikaṅ mənur niyata ṅūni ya sumpiṅ ikā,</l>
. <l n="c">ya ta pinipilnire nəpəpakən riṅ iruṅ vəkasan,</l>
. <l n="d">lagi maməkul səkar sira hanan vagugən ri hati.</l>
. </lg>

. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_33.15" n="15">
6305 <l n="a">nrəpasuta ləṅləṅ epu haṅəsah sira tiṅgənəsən,</l>
. <l n="b">lagi tumiliṅ siran rəṅə-rəṅə̄n təkapiṅ bhramara,</l>
. <l n="c">riris adulur sadāgati mirir ya manisni sikuṅ,</l>
. <l n="d">maṅaṅən-aṅən ta saṅ nrəpatiputra rikaṅ parana.</l>
. </lg><!-- note: (sira) tan ... deleted check trans -->

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="34" met="pr̥thvītala" xml:id="kakavin_34">
6330 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-++\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">narendra mulat iṅ laṅit paranikaṅ tinon kādbhutha,</l>
. <l n="b">maṅuṅkuli pasir samar kadi kukus madəg riṅ bañu,</l>
. <l n="c">hanan kadi gunuṅ mibər kadi gərəh kətugniṅ laṅit,</l>
6335 <l n="d">bañunya kumusuh təkapnikaṅ aṅin manub miṇḍuhur.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">maṅuṅkuli</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">maṅəṅuli</rdg></app>
6340 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">rikā ta yan avas katon kala piśāca tan len ḍatəṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">sakeṅ təṅah ikaṅ pasir huvus amukti mīnāvərə̄,</l>
. <l n="c">hanān kasulitən tutuknya kinavilnya deniṅ tamah,</l>
6345 <l n="d">siyuṅnya matavan pəsut kaburayut lavan ləmbvara.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">piśāca</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pisacā</rdg>
6350 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sakeṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">sake</rdg>
. </app>
6355 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mīnāvərə̄</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mīṇavərəh</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
6360 <lem wit="#EdSSA #P">siyuṅnya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #T">sihuṅnya</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.03" n="3">
6365 <l n="a">hane nigit-igit vaneh kasəlapiṅ bahəm len gaḍiṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">patuknya maluṅid mabaṅ kasavitan dagiṅ len usus,</l>
. <l n="c">hanān kadi bhaṭāra kāla mamaṅan sarāt kādbhuta,</l>
. <l n="d">təkāṅamah-amah sayojana ruhurnya len gəṅnika.</l>
. </lg>
6370 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vaneh</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">dudūṅ</rdg>
. </app>
6375 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#P">mamaṅan sarāt kādbhuta</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #T">mamaṅan sarāt kadbhuta</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">mamaṅun saray kādbhuta</rdg>
. </app>
6380 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">təkāṅamah-amah</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">təkāmaṅamah-amah</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
6385 <lem wit="#EdSSA #P #T">sayojana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">sayojñana</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.04" n="4">
6390 <l n="a">samāntara katon tikaṅ nalamalāṅadəg riṅ karaṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">mulat ri kahanan saṅ arjuna paran kunaṅ liṅnika,</l>
. <l n="c">katon ta sira denya śīghra mavəlu vulatnyārəṅu,</l>
. <l n="d">vvaṅ ekaki ya tah manuṅgal aṅamuṅ nāhan liṅnika.</l>
. </lg>
6395 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vvaṅ ekaki ya tah</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mapeki nara yan</rdg>
. </app>
6400 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">katon tikanaṅ astra denya kalavan laras taṅkulak,</l>
. <l n="b">lavan kavaca ratna sampun ahaləp tikaṅ bhūsaṇa,</l>
. <l n="c">hyaṅ indra ri hiḍəpnya tan hana vaneh katəmvīrika,</l>
6405 <l n="d">ya hetunika yan panantva humasə̄ ri saṅ bhūpati.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">katon tikanaṅ</lem>
6410 <rdg wit="#T">katon ikānaṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hanā</rdg>
6415 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ya<seg type="interpolation"> ta</seg>
.</rdg>
6420 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">arah paranikā gatinta masabhā rikeṅ tāṭaka,</l>
. <l n="b">tuvin lituhajəṅ mabhūsaṇa maṇik surūpāhaləp,</l>
6425 <l n="c">surāpsara kunaṅ kiteki maṅənəs mahapet laṅə̄,</l>
. <l n="d">varah taku ri donyu yan syapa ṅaranta pājar kita.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
6430 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">paranikā</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">paranike</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">rikeṅ</lem>
6435 <rdg wit="#T">rikiṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mabhūsaṇa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">sabhūsaṇa</rdg>
6440 </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mahapet</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mahāpet</rdg>
. </app>
6445 <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#L #P">taku</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">tāku</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
6450 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kita</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">kami</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.07" n="7">
6455 <l n="a">nahan vuvus ikaṅ piśāca kala yan patakvan ṅaran,</l>
. <l n="b">sagadgada manah nrəpātmaja vavaṅ sirājar ṅaran,</l>
. <l n="c">ṅhulun katiki saṅ dhanāñjaya ṅaranku riṅ rāt gahan,</l>
. <l n="d">mareṅ vukir ameta śūnya patapan ya donkun ḍatəṅ.</l>
. </lg>
6460 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#L #P #T">nahan</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">nāhan</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">piśāca</lem><rdg wit="#T">pisacā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ṅaran</lem><rdg wit="#T">təhər</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P">mareṅ vukir ameta śūnya patapan ya</lem><rdg wit="#L">mareṅ hukir amet ta śūnya patapan ya</rdg><rdg wit="#T">mareṅṅ ukir amet kaśūnyan atapayva</rdg></app></listApp>
6465 <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">nahan varah i saṅ dhanāñjaya vavaṅ tikaṅ rākṣasa,</l>
. <l n="b">masə̄ṅit aṅadəg kamānavibhavanyan aṅrik humuṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">pəpət pənuh ikaṅ jagat təkap i śabdaniṅ rākṣasa,</l>
. <l n="d">kavəs tiḍəm ikaṅ surāvənəs alek hyaṅ arkākucəm.</l>
6470 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a"><lem wit="#L #P #T">nahan</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">nāhan</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">jagat</lem><rdg wit="#T">prajā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">surāvənəs alek</lem><rdg wit="#T">jagatpaḍa malek</rdg></app>
6475 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">vavaṅ ya maṅavil gunuṅ kabarubuh sivak taṅ karaṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">katūt pasīnikaṅ gunuṅ ya ḍinavutnya tan kārkaśa,</l>
. <l n="c">pəṅuṅ huvuṅ-uvuṅ luvaṅya hinuṅaṅ katon jronikā,</l>
6480 <l n="d">taṅan kiva ya śīghra yan kadi marindi tan pāntara.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"> <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hinuṅaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">ninuṅaṅ</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.10" n="10">
6485 <l n="a">narendra matihaṅ śarottama təlas madan bhūṣaṇa,</l>
. <l n="b">sapājar ira saṅ manobhava ya ṅūni keṅətnira,</l>
. <l n="c">ya hetunira yan pacintya humənəṅ tatan saṅśaya,</l>
. <l n="d">apan vruh i katattvaniṅ kala dumeh sirādan muvah.</l>
. </lg>
6490 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sapājar</lem><rdg wit="#T">sapajar</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P">ya ṅūni</lem><rdg wit="#L">ya ṅūnī</rdg><rdg wit="#T">ri ṅūnī</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tatan</lem><rdg wit="#T">datan</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_34.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">təkānudiṅi taṅ kalāṅāmah-amah ri saṅ bhūpati,</l>
. <l n="b">ayay narakajanma ko pva paṅaran si pārthādhama,</l>
. <l n="c">prayojananikiṅ kalātri malayan ḍatəṅ ko harah,</l>
6495 <l n="d">nda mah tamah-amah gunuṅ vatu tikāṅ umatyā ri ko.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#L #P #T">təkānudiṅi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">tekānudiṅi</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">pārthādhama</lem><rdg wit="#T">parthadhama</rdg></app></listApp>
. </div>
6500 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="35" met="-+---+-+---+--+--=" xml:id="kakavin_35">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
. <!--<div type="canto" rend="met" n="35" met="dhṛti group" xml:id="kakavin_35"> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">nahan ta vacananyan aṅgrəgut aṅuṇḍa gunuṅ maruhur,</l>
6505 <l n="b">narendra mamapag riṅ astra śara bahni murub dumilah,</l>
. <l n="c">prakāṭa sumənə̄ ya riṅ gagana maṅhibəkiṅ bhuvana,</l>
. <l n="d">hilaṅ matəmahan ləbū sapaṅasə̄nikanaṅ kalana.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
6510 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aṅuṇḍa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">haṅuṇḍa</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
6515 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">riṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">riṅṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">prakāṭa sumənə̄</lem>
6520 <rdg wit="#T">prakasa sumənə</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#L">maṅhibəkiṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #T">maṅibəki</rdg>
6525 <rdg wit="#P">māṅibəkī</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sapaṅasə̄nikanaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">sapaṅaṅśəhnikānaṅ</rdg>
6530 </app>
. </listApp>
. <!-- Z has no text here, but the reading of the etext is maṅibəkiṅ -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">gəsəṅ sahananiṅ tahən ri təpiniṅ hulusan kahava,</l>
6535 <l n="b">təkapnikanaṅ astra bahni dumudug təka riṅ viyati,</l>
. <l n="c">paḍāvrəg alayū tikaṅ sura kabeh mavədīṅ pralaya,</l>
. <l n="d">tumon ri pamaṅan hyaṅ agniśara tan kavənaṅ tinahən.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
6540 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P">hulusan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #T">vulusan</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
6545 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">təkapnikanaṅ astra</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">təkapnikanaṅṅ astra<seg type="interpolation"> śara</seg></rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">alayū</lem>
6550 <rdg wit="#T">halayu</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mavədīṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mavədi</rdg>
6555 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ri</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">riṅ</rdg>
. </app>
6560 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">muvah ya maṅalap karaṅ bhujaga sevu ḍəpanya gənəp,</l>
. <l n="b">ruhurnya kalavan davanya kadi bajra makas maluṅid,</l>
. <l n="c">ya pandəmakənanya yeka maṅuhuh sahasānudiṅi,</l>
6565 <l n="d">sinep rinuhunan riṅ astra śara bahni təkap nrəpati.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">bhujaga</lem>
6570 <rdg wit="#T">bhujaghga</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#L #P #T">ruhurnya kalavan davanya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">ruhurnya davanya</rdg>
6575 </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">bajra</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">bajrā</rdg>
. </app>
6580 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#L #P">pandəmakənanya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">pandəmakəna</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">pandəmmakənanya</rdg>
. </app>
6585 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">maṅuhuh sahasānudiṅi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">maṅuvuh sahasanudiṅiṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
6590 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">riṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">riṅṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">śara</lem>
6595 <rdg wit="#T">sarā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">ya hetunika yan masə̄ṅit aṅalap ta ya śūla bisa</l>
6600 <l n="b">saṅaṅ ḍəpa davanya gə̄ṅnika satal saha kasnya murub</l>
. <l n="c">tumindak aṅusap ləmah ta ya manūdiṅ amuṣṭi lipuṅ</l>
. <l n="d">taṅan kiva maṅuṇḍa mālih i təṅən ya mapet pamədi</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
6605 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P">masə̄ṅit aṅalap ta ya</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">masə̄ṅit aṅalap ta</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">masəṅit haṅalap ta</rdg>
. </app>
6610 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">saṅaṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">saṅa</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
6615 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aṅusap</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">haṅusap</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">manūdiṅ amuṣṭi lipuṅ</lem>
6620 <rdg wit="#T">manudiṅṅ i muṣṭi limpuṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#L #P">maṅuṇḍa mālih i təṅən</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">maṅuṇḍa mālih təṅən</rdg>
6625 <rdg wit="#T">maṅuṇḍā malih iṅ təṅən</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">huvusnika masə̄ ta yāṅgətəm arəs manah iṅ lumihat,</l>
6630 <l n="b">matanya mavəlū mabaṅ kadi ta sūrya səḍəṅ dumilah,</l>
. <l n="c">cihah ta mahamah vulat ryaku nihan ta lipuṅku murub,</l>
. <l n="d">umatyana ri ko vikū narakajanma na liṅnikahən.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">huvusnika masə̄</lem><rdg wit="#T">vuvusnikā maṅśə</rdg></app>
6635 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#P">yāṅgətəm arəs manah</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">yaṅgələm arəs muvah</rdg><rdg wit="#L">yaṅgətəm arəs manah</rdg><rdg wit="#T">yaṅgəttəm marəs manah</rdg></app>
. <app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mavəlū</lem><rdg wit="#T">mavəlu</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">cihah</lem><rdg wit="#T">cihā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA">ryaku</lem><rdg wit="#L #P #T">yryaku</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">umatyana</lem><rdg wit="#T">umatyane</rdg></app>
6640 <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vikū narakajanma</lem><rdg wit="#T">viku narakājanmā</rdg></app>
. <app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">liṅnikahən</lem><rdg wit="#T">linakahən</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">narendra matihaṅ śarottama təlas pinasaṅnira ya,</l>
. <l n="b">tulak tala minuṣṭi rovaṅika bāyu masātma śara,</l>
6645 <l n="c">aṅinya mamusus gunuṅ kabarubuh gumuruh kumətug</l>
. <l n="d">punah sahananiṅ tahən kadi ləbū kumukus ya katūb</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">śarottama</lem><rdg wit="#T">sarottamma</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tala</lem><rdg wit="#T">kala</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">rovaṅika bāyu</lem><rdg wit="#T">rovaṅṅikā bayu</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.07" n="7">
6650 <l n="a">ikaṅ nalamalāṅadəg kavəvəgən ri təṅahniṅ aṅin</l>
. <l n="b">pətəṅ təkap i śaktiniṅ śaraṇa bāyu masātma śara</l>
. <l n="c">anusmaraṇa tan surudnika hilaṅ tikaṅ astra katub</l>
. <l n="d">tikəl kahabalaṅ ta śūlanika sāk tumibeṅ jaladhi</l>
. </lg><!-- L sək -->
6655 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P">nalamalāṅadəg kavəvəgən</lem><rdg wit="#L">nalamalāṅadəg kavəgəgən</rdg><rdg wit="#T">nalamalaṅadəg kavəgəgən</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">təṅahniṅ aṅin</lem><rdg wit="#T">təṅahniṅṅ ṅaṅin</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">bāyu</lem><rdg wit="#T">bayu</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">surudnika hilaṅ tikaṅ astra</lem><rdg wit="#T">surud rika hilaṅnikaṅṅ astrā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">śūlanika</lem><rdg wit="#T">śulanikā</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">umūr ya sakarəṅ madan manah acintya vara prabhava,</l>
. <l n="b">aneka vəkasiṅ kaśaktin atikādbhuta riṅ katara,</l>
. <l n="c">vənaṅ guməsəṅeṅ sarāt sahananiṅ surajanma kabeh,</l>
6660 <l n="d">savaṅnya kadi saptasūrya dumələ̄ təkaniṅ pralaya.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">prabhava</lem><rdg wit="#T">prabhāvā </rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aneka vəkasiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanekā vəlasiṅ</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">atikādbhuta</lem><rdg wit="#T">hatikadbhuttā</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">guməsəṅeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">guməsəṅe</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">surajanma</lem><rdg wit="#T">surajanmā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">saptasūrya dumələ̄</lem><rdg wit="#T">saptāsūryya dumələṅ</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">yadin maluya śūnya taṅ bhuvana denya na lor na kidul</l>
6665 <l n="b">lāvan ta ya ləmah laṅit hilaṅa denya təkeṅ jaladhi</l>
. <l n="c">yan ahyuna ta meman iṅ samara liṅnya ya dadyakəna</l>
. <l n="d">ya hetunika yan payoga humənəṅ ya maṅeka hiḍəp.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">bhuvana</lem><rdg wit="#T">bhūvanā</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">denya na lor na kidul</lem><rdg wit="#T">denyan aṅalor haṅidul</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hilaṅa</lem><rdg wit="#T">hilaṅṅa</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ahyuna</lem><rdg wit="#T">hahyuna</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">samara</lem><rdg wit="#T">sammāsa</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hetunika</lem><rdg wit="#T">hetuniṅka</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">maṅeka</lem><rdg wit="#T">maṅekā</rdg></app></listApp>
6670 <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">enak mara həniṅnya tan dva manarīra bhaṭāra kala,</l>
. <l n="b">agə̄ṅ dumudug iṅ laṅit ruhur ikāməkasīṅ aruhur,</l>
. <l n="c">taṅanya gumagap surālaya kavəs tikaṅ indrapada,</l>
. <l n="d">hyaṅ arka matakut kasuṇḍul alayū sumurup makucəm.</l>
6675 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">enak</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanak</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#L #P">manarīra</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">manarira</rdg><rdg wit="#T">manarirā</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ruhur</lem><rdg wit="#T">ruhūrr</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">surālaya</lem><rdg wit="#T">suralayā</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">tikaṅṅ</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hyaṅ arka</lem><rdg wit="#T">hyaṅṅ arkkā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">alayū</lem><rdg wit="#T">ālayu</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">lumaṅkah aṅalor kahənti katikaṅ bhuvanāṇḍa kabeh,</l>
. <l n="b">kasat bañunikaṅ samudra tinavunya ri jə̄ṅnya pisan,</l>
6680 <l n="c">ivaknika katūt kasaṅsaṅ i sukunya pəsut vuhaya,</l>
. <l n="d">hanan kaburayut kasambit i vulunya savaṅ kapukət.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">aṅalor</lem><rdg wit="#T">āṅalor</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">bhuvanāṇḍa</lem><rdg wit="#T">bhūvaṇnānda</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kasat</lem><rdg wit="#T">hasat</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">samudra</lem><rdg wit="#T">samudrā</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">jə̄ṅnya</lem><rdg wit="#T">jəṅ</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ivaknika</lem><rdg wit="#T">ivaknikā</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kasaṅsaṅ i</lem><rdg wit="#T">kasuṅṅśaṅ hi</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #P">pəsut vuhaya</lem><rdg wit="#L">pisut vuhaya</rdg><rdg wit="#T">pəsut vuvaya</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kaburayut kasambit i</lem><rdg wit="#T">haburayut kasambit thiṅ</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.12" n="12">
6685 <l n="a">ləmah pracalitākədut kadi ginañjuh ikaṅ prəthivī,</l>
. <l n="b">hanān kadi midə̄ṅ tikaṅ bhūvana denya təkeṅ gagana,</l>
. <l n="c">gunuṅ kadi bitin pracaṇḍa gumivaṅ kadi cakra midər,</l>
. <l n="d">rəbah kabarubuh tikaṅ kayu kabeh sahaneṅ acala.</l>
. </lg>
6690 <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">pracalitākədut</lem><rdg wit="#T">pracalita kədvat</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ginañjuh</lem><rdg wit="#T">ginañjah</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">midə̄ṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">midər</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">bhūvana</lem><rdg wit="#T">bhūvanā</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">cakra</lem><rdg wit="#T">cakrā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kabarubuh</lem><rdg wit="#T">kaṅ kayu barubuh</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kabeh sahaneṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">pəjah sahanaṅṅ</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.13" n="13">
. <l n="a">paḍāvrəg alayū tapā-tapa haneṅ giriśūnyavana</l>
. <l n="b">kasuṅsaṅ apuyəṅ kajəmbak avalik hana kontal adoh,</l>
. <l n="c">hanan vuvus i matya liṅnika vuruṅ yan aminta tuluṅ,</l>
6695 <l n="d">vaneh muna vuruṅ ndatan tulus apan ya masambat avū.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA">paḍāvrəg alayū</lem><rdg wit="#T">paḍāvrəggh alayu</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#L #P">tapā-tapa</lem><rdg wit="#EdSSA">tapa-tapa</rdg><rdg wit="#T">tikaṅ tapā</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">apuyəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">kapuyəṅ</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">avalik hana kontal adoh</lem><rdg wit="#T">havalikkan hakontal hadoh</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hanan vuvus</lem><rdg wit="#T">hanāṅuvuhh</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">liṅnika vuruṅ yan amnita</lem><rdg wit="#T">liṅnikā huruṅ y amintā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">muna</lem><rdg wit="#T">munā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">masambat avū</lem><rdg wit="#T">pasambat havu</rdg></app></listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_35.14" n="14">
. <l n="a">samaṅkanani śaktiniṅ nalamalā məpəkīṅ bhuvana,</l>
6700 <l n="b">ndatan tuhu bhisanya pan kali hinernya yadin mijila,</l>
. <l n="c">kunaṅ pva təkapiṅ kamūrkhan i hatinya pətəṅ sumaput,</l>
. <l n="d">ya hetunika yan parāharəp anīrṇakəneṅ nrəpati.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
6705 <app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">samaṅkanani</lem><rdg wit="#T">samaṅkanāni</rdg></app><app loc="b"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">tuhu</lem><rdg wit="#T">uhu</rdg></app><app loc="a"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">mijila</lem><rdg wit="#T">vijilā</rdg></app><app loc="c"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">kamūrkhan i</lem><rdg wit="#T">kāmūrkkān ri</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hetunika</lem><rdg wit="#T">hetunikā</rdg></app><app loc="d"><lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">anīrṇakəneṅ</lem><rdg wit="#T">akīrṇnakəne</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="36" met="--+--+--+-+=" xml:id="kakavin_36">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-+\-+=</note> -->
6710 <!-- <div type="canto" rend="met" n="36" met="jagatī group" xml:id="kakavin_36">
. -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">nrəpaputra madan sira yoga sandhi,</l>
. <l n="b">matutur pavarah hyaṅ anaṅga ṅūni,</l>
6715 <l n="c">ri katattvanikaṅ kala śiṣya durgā,</l>
. <l n="d">ya dumeh sira metanaṅ astra siddhi.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">
6720 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hyaṅ anaṅga ṅūni</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hyaṅṅ anaṅgā ṅuni</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">katattvanikaṅ</lem>
6725 <rdg wit="#T">katattvanika</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdZ">metanaṅ astra</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">met tanaṅ astra</rdg>
6730 <rdg wit="#T">met tanaṅṅ astrā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">humənəṅ ta narendra maṅekacitta,</l>
6735 <l n="b">patitisniṅ acintya təlas pinəh ya,</l>
. <l n="c">pinasaṅnira taṅ vara pañcatīrtha,</l>
. <l n="d">makagəgvan ikaṅ taya śūnya laṅgəṅ.</l>
. </lg>

. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">ri huvusniṅ amiśra śarīra śūnya,</l>
6755 <l n="b">manarīra ta saṅ hyaṅ aṅekapakṣa,</l>
. <l n="c">bhuvanāṇḍa kabeh humənəṅ katikṣṇan,</l>
. <l n="d">təkapiṅ nala cintamaṇī samādhi.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">sumənə̄ ta bhaṭāra jagatpramāṇa,</l>
6790 <l n="b">sakarī nada niṣkala sūkṣmatattva,</l>
. <l n="c">mapa rūpa bhaṭāra rikaṅ samaṅkā,</l>
. <l n="d">taya varṇa luput sira yan vinastu.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">

6810 <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">savulatnikanaṅ kala śiṣya durgā,</l>
. <l n="b">ri narendra katon ta bhaṭāra denya,</l>
. <l n="c">maṅadəg ri lalāṭa narendraputra,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi teja sənə̄nira sarvavarṇa.</l>
6815 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="b">

. </listApp>
6825 <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">ya dumehnikanaṅ kala yan mavədya,</l>
. <l n="b">matakut ri bhaṭāra jagat gurutva,</l>
. <l n="c">sira teki vəkasniṅ anr̥ṣṭi siddhi,</l>
. <l n="d">ya dumehnika yan matakut katona,</l>
6830 </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">malayū tikanaṅ kala keraṅan ya,</l>
. <l n="b">masənə̄ tan amor ya riṅ antarikṣa,</l>
6845 <l n="c">maṅuhuh ya maliṇḍuṅan iṅ gaṇākrəp,</l>
. <l n="d">sumave riṅ aran pravarārya pārtha.</l>

6875 <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">ndah ayay mara koṅ asu pārtha mūḍha,</l>
. <l n="b">pakaśatrunikiṅ kala śaktimanta,</l>
. <l n="c">vinaliṅmu tatan pamahāku maṅke,</l>
. <l n="d">tan umātya ri ko pvaku kaṣṭa hīna.</l>
6880 </lg>

. </listApp>
6900 <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">hələm iṅ kali yan vijilāku riṅ rāt,</l>
. <l n="b">kalakeya tikā ṅaranaṅkva tan len,</l>
. <l n="c">tiga sānak ikaṅ kala dadyanaṅkva,</l>
. <l n="d">irikākun umatyana pāṇḍava rva.</l>
6905 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a">

6920 <rdg wit="#T">umatyanā</rdg></app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">hana rākṣasa sūkṣma hulunku śakti,</l>
. <l n="b">madamāna kədə̄ ya ta dadyananya,</l>
6925 <l n="c">ri hatinta tikān umahanya tan len,</l>
. <l n="d">ya dumadyakənan madacitta mūrkha.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">

6935 <rdg wit="#EdSSA">manamāna kədə ya ta</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">madāmanā kədə yat tha</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">

. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">irikākun umətva sakeṅ madanta,</l>
6950 <l n="b">taya śūnya tikā havanaṅkva tan dva,</l>
. <l n="c">ndan i vādamu sānak akun paməṅan,</l>
. <l n="d">kali yekana herakənaṅkva maṅke,</l>
. </lg>

6965 <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.12" n="12">
. <l n="a">ya ta pājar ikaṅ kala śiṣya durgā,</l>
. <l n="b">ri narendra mulat sira tan vighāni,</l>
. <l n="c">atəhər tikanaṅ kala mūr vināśa,</l>
. <l n="d">kadi megha paḍanya hilaṅ kalahrun.</l>
6970 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus"><app loc="a">

. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.13" n="13">
6985 <l n="a">ri hilaṅnikanaṅ kala śiṣya durgā,</l>
. <l n="b">kavəṅan ta narendra tumon hilaṅnya,</l>
. <l n="c">kadi riṅ svapəneka hilaṅnya sūkṣma,</l>
. <l n="d">təkapiṅ nala cintamaṇin samādhi.</l>
. </lg>
6990 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #L #P #T">kala</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA">kalā</rdg>
. </app>
6995 <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">riṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
7000 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">cintamaṇin samādhi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">cittamanin samadhi</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.14" n="14">
7005 <l n="a">ya dumeh sira saṅ viku tan maṅela,</l>
. <l n="b">masamādhi tatan katəṅər pamūjā,</l>
. <l n="c">ndan acintya ləkasnira sūkṣma teka,</l>
. <l n="d">vənaṅ ekaśarīra sirān payajña.</l>
. </lg>
7010 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">masamādhi</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">masamadhi</rdg>
. </app>
7015 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">katəṅər pamūjā</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">katəhər pamujā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
7020 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">acintya ləkasnira</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hacintya ləkasnirā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">vənaṅ ekaśarīra</lem>
7025 <rdg wit="#T">vənaṅṅ ekāsarirā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.15" n="15">
. <l n="a">iva maṅkana saṅ nrəpaputra pārtha,</l>
7030 <l n="b">paṅalahnira rākṣasa tan śarāstra,</l>
. <l n="c">aradin ya masimpən alit pamāti,</l>
. <l n="d">sira yogya tinūt sira denta dhīra.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
7035 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">iva</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">ivā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
7040 <lem wit="#T">saṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">tā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">rākṣasa</lem>
7045 <rdg wit="#T">rakṣasā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">alit</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">halit</rdg>
7050 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_36.16" n="16">
. <l n="a">irikā ta narendra madan lumampah,</l>
. <l n="b">ḍatəṅeṅ patapan kahanan munīndra,</l>
7055 <l n="c">savarah hyaṅ anaṅga tinūt nireka,</l>
. <l n="d">maṅavetan anūt sira jə̄ṅ iṅ agra.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">

. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="37" met="vasantatilakā" xml:id="kakavin_37">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-+=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.01" n="1">
7085 <l n="a">maṇḍəg ta lampahira deni gərəhnikaṅ lvah,</l>
. <l n="b">lvir śabdaniṅ kala humuṅ juga pāṅiḍəpnya,</l>
. <l n="c">ñər tvasnirāṅaṅən-aṅən humənəṅ katikṣṇan,</l>
. <l n="d">dvandvan sirā rəṅə-rəṅən təkapiṅ piśāca.</l>
. </lg>
7090 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ta</lem><rdg wit="#T" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>

. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">deni</lem>
7095 <rdg wit="#T">deniṅ</rdg>
. </app>

7100 </app>

7105 </app>

. <rdg wit="#T">sira</rdg>
. </app>
7115 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">yekān lumampah anusup sira riṅ halas gə̄ṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">akveh tikaṅ vinulatan paḍa rāmya śobha,</l>
. <l n="c">kayvanya kapva masəkar manəḍəṅ kabehnya,</l>
7120 <l n="d">kumbaṅ tumāp riya hanan vahu mūr tan andəl.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">mraknyāṅiriṅ ri paṅ ikaṅ kayu teja məmbaṅ,</l>
7155 <l n="b">svecchātəhər ya manisik mamivir həlarnya,</l>
. <l n="c">lyan tekanaṅ maṅiḍukus maturū tan imba,</l>
. <l n="d">siṅsal həlarnya kasilir gumilap hijonya.</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.04" n="4">
7190 <l n="a">luṅhā ta lampahira saṅ nrəpaputra pārtha,</l>
. <l n="b">yekān kapaṅgih ikanaṅ lvah agə̄ṅ pavitra,</l>
. <l n="c">tus-tusnikaṅ bañu sakeṅ vukir indrakīla,</l>
. <l n="d">madrəs hilīnya mahəniṅ kadi nīla molah.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">yekān patīrtha sira saṅ nrəpaputra pārtha,</l>
. <l n="b">trī sādhyaniṅ maśuci lakṣana len rahupnya,</l>
7220 <l n="c">sampun maṅastuti sirāyuga mudra cakra,</l>
. <l n="d">madyus ta saṅ nrəpatiputra təhər makəm-kəm.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">agrah maṅel gəyuh ikaṅ suku len śarīra,</l>
. <l n="b">maṅkəp gigirnira maṅel təkapiṅ mayuddha,</l>
7245 <l n="c">lāvan tigaṅ vəṅi lavasnira tan kəneṅ mrəm,</l>
. <l n="d">mvaṅ tan kəneṅ nasi dumeh sira luhyaṅ ambək.</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.07" n="7">

. <l n="b">ṅrəsnyan pukah kukunikaṅ suku lot kasaṇḍuṅ,</l>
7265 <l n="c">yekan kinə̄mnira təhər sinusur ləmahnya,</l>
. <l n="d">vuṅkal hitəm ya ta paluṅguhaniṅ makəm-kəm.</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">məntas ta saṅ nrəpatiputra təlasnirādyus,</l>
. <l n="b">enak ta buddhinira denya təlas matustus,</l>
. <l n="c">somyākəmul maṅiḍukus ta sirān paluṅguh,</l>
7295 <l n="d">rī vitnikaṅ kayu manis masamīpa señjaṅ.</l>
. </lg>

7315 <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.09" n="9">
. <l n="a">ṅkā teka saṅ nrəpati yan humənəṅ maṅun-ṅun,</l>
. <l n="b">monəṅ ri saṅ babu lavan kaka len saṅ antən,</l>
. <l n="c">yekāsəkəl ri hati luh təmahanya tan dva,</l>
. <l n="d">madrəs vətunya ri matāmuharosah aṅlih.</l>
7320 </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_37.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">maṅkin sirāṅisək-isək səsəgən tan ampət,</l>

7335 <l n="c">lāvan rarasniṅ inucap təkapiṅ vvaṅ adyah,</l>
. <l n="d">maṅkin tikaṅ hati pətəṅ hibəkan laronəṅ.</l>

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="38" met="candravartma" xml:id="kakavin_38">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_38.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">saṅ nrəpātmaja taṅeh laranira yan,</l>
7365 <l n="b">tūt ta riṅ lara hiḍəpnira vulaṅun,</l>
. <l n="c">yeka hetunira yan paṅaṅən-aṅən,</l>
. <l n="d">vitnikaṅ kayu pinetnira riṅ ati.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
7370 <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">nrəpātmaja</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">nrəpatmajā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
7375 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">vulaṅun</lem>

. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">yeka</lem>

. </app>
. <app loc="c">

. <rdg wit="#T">yepaṅaṅən-haṅən</rdg>
7385 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">ati</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hati</rdg>
. </app>
7390 </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_38.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">sampuniṅ lara hilaṅ təkapira saṅ,</l>
. <l n="b">phalgunāmuhara citta kadi maṇik.</l>
. <l n="c">dhīraniṅ hati pinəh lagi tinutur,</l>
7395 <l n="d">yeka hetuni manahnira malicin.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">sampuniṅ lara hilaṅ təkapira saṅ</lem>

. </app>

. <rdg wit="#T">licin</rdg>
. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_38.03" n="3">
7420 <l n="a">vahv adan siran umaṅkata maṅadəg,</l>
. <l n="b">yeka yan kasuririṅ sira mapuyəṅ,</l>
. <l n="c">deni tisnikaṅ avak təhər alapā,</l>
. <l n="d">yeka hetuni panonira na kunəṅ.</l>
. </lg>
7425 <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">siran umaṅkata</lem>

. </app>

. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">yeka hetuni</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">yekā etunira</rdg>
7445 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #P">na kunəṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">na kuniṅ</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#T">kuniṅ</rdg>
7450 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_38.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">tan vavaṅ sira lumampah apan aṅel,</l>
. <l n="b">dohnikaṅ parana yeka vinulatan,</l>
7455 <l n="c">tūt hiriṅ lakunirān panəbu-nəbu,</l>
. <l n="d">tovi mār sukunirāpamuhara lon.</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
7460 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">apan aṅel</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">āpan haṅel</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">parana</lem>
7465 <rdg wit="#T">paraṇā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">hiriṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hiri</rdg>
7470 </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA">sukunirāpamuhara</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L #P">sukunirāmapuvara</rdg>

. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="39" met="mr̥dukomala" xml:id="kakavin_39">
7735 <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">tan ṅeh yan caritan laṅə̄nikaṅ alas paḍāmuhara kuṅ</l>
. <l n="b">luṅhā lampahirā nrəpātmaja matūt gəgər ləṅit adoh</l>
. <l n="c">ṅkāne himbaṅ ikaṅ vukir hana ta pājaran kavulatan</l>
7740 <l n="d">rāmyārūm racaṇanya sarva kusumānəḍəṅ mrik umiṅiṅ</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">ṅkā tekā nrəpaputra yan panəmu bhikṣukāmava raga</l>
. <l n="b">pakṣāmeta gaṅan hiḍəpnira ya hetuniṅ mariṅ alas</l>
. <l n="c">sahyāṅiṇḍitakən patil sira matūt hiriṅ tan ahili</l>
7785 <l n="d">maṅsə̄ śīghra narendra yan laku mareṅ sirātaña-taña</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">dū saṅtabya ranakta saṅ tapa, maṅantya ta mpu sakarəṅ</l>
. <l n="b">ndā mahyun varahən ṅhulun ri ṅaraniṅ vanāśrama katon</l>
. <l n="c">lāvan teki ṅaran saṅ ugratapa yogya pājara təmən</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">nān liṅ saṅ nrəpaputra yekan aṅadəg ta saṅ tapa mulat</l>
7875 <l n="b">yatnālepana teki yan kaməna mājarātvaṅ ararəm</l>
. <l n="c">dū sojarni bapaṅku tan hana vaneh sireki vinuvus</l>
. <l n="d">śrī dvaipāyana nāma saṅ pinakaliṅganiṅ sapatapan</l>
. </lg>

7905 <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">lāvan teki ṅaranyaṅ āśrama riṅ iṅgitāmrətapada</l>
. <l n="b">kakhyātī vinuvus patīrthanira saṅ mamet kaləpasən</l>
. <l n="c">vastu byakta pavitra maṅhilaṅakən gələhniṅ umara</l>
. <l n="d">nān liṅ saṅ tapa śīghra yan laku muvah mareṅ halas agə̄ṅ</l>
7910 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">

. <app loc="d">
7940 <lem wit="#EdSSA #L #P">nān</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">na</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.06" n="6">
7945 <l n="a">enak buddhini saṅ nrəpātmaja təkapnira mpu mavarah</l>
. <l n="b">yekādan sira yan lumakva ḍatəṅe mahārəṣivara</l>
. <l n="c">ṅkā tekā nrəpaputra yan ḍatəṅ i jə̄ṅ munīndra karuṇa</l>
. <l n="d">yatnānambah acāmanā ləmah i pāda saṅ yativara</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.07" n="7">
. <l n="a">ṅkān śīghrā maṅadəg munīndra maməkul ri saṅ nrəpasuta</l>
. <l n="b">om vuṅsuṅku sabhāgya yan təka putuṅku liṅ munivara</l>
. <l n="c">atyanteki giraṅku denta putu yan ḍatəṅ riṅ acala</l>
7990 <l n="d">ndah ṅke ṅke taśileṅ patāraṇa nā liṅnirāgəmə-gəmən</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.08" n="8">

. <l n="b">ndātan kram kita yan tinonku kadi rūpaniṅ prihatina</l>
8025 <l n="c">toh vuṅsuṅku mapeki donani ḍatəṅta riṅ kadi kami</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.10" n="10">

. <l n="c">ṅkā luṅhā nrəpa dharmaputra mara riṅ pradeśa masənə̄t</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_39.11" n="11">
. <l n="a">ṅkā ta prāpta sira mpu dhomya kalavan saṅ ārya vidura</l>

. <l n="c">mvaṅ devī ibuni ṅhulun sira tumūt kapāpa kaluṣa</l>

8195 <div type="canto" rend="met" n="40" met="viṣasmara" xml:id="kakavin_40">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">“dvan ikin ḍatəṅ ra putu saṅ munīndra ri sira</l>
. <l n="b">“inutusni saṅ nr̥pati dharmaputra katika</l>
8200 <l n="c">kalavan munīndra rəṣi dhomya tan hana vaneh</l>
. <l n="d">maṅutus mareṅ vukir ameta śūnya patapan</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
8205 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">ikin</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">iki</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">munīndra</lem>
8210 <rdg wit="#T">munindrā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #P">inutusni</lem>
. <rdg wit="#L">inutusnira</rdg>
8215 <rdg wit="#T">iṅutusni</rdg>
. <witDetail wit="#T" type="pc"/>
. <rdg wit="#T">iṅutusnira</rdg>
. <witDetail wit="#T" type="ac"/>
. </app>
8220 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">dharmaputra</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">dharmaputrā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
8225 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">munīndra</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">munindrā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">vukir ameta śūnya</lem>
8230 <rdg wit="#T">hukir hameti sun</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">vukir indrakīla patuduhnireki parana</l>
8235 <l n="b">riṅ amet anugraha bhaṭāra rudra saphala</l>
. <l n="c">kalavan ri pādanira yogya māsiha təmən</l>
. <l n="d">ya ta liṅnira mpu rəṣi dhomya yan mapitutur”</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">na vuvus narendra saha luhnirādaravayan</l>
. <l n="b">humənəṅ ta saṅ rəṣi savetnikaṅ lara magə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="c">vəkasan munīndra mavuvus ri saṅ nr̥pasuta</l>
8265 <l n="d">atərəh ta śabdanira somya mardava marūm</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.04" n="4">
. <l n="a">putuni ṅhulun lalu təkapta durnaya dahat</l>
8295 <l n="b">katəkan malānaputi maṅruvat sukha magə̄ṅ</l>
. <l n="c">vruh akun titah juga tinūtnikaṅ hala hayu</l>
. <l n="d">mapa pājaraṅkva ri putuṅku menaka rəṅə̄n</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.05" n="5">
. <l n="a">“pituturku ṅūni ri putuṅku sampun apagəh</l>
. <l n="b">“purih iṅ rumakṣa sukhaniṅ śarīra katika</l>
8330 <l n="c">“mada rāga moha ya musuhta nitya maparək</l>
. <l n="d">“ya ta lot mijil jagani riṅ sahiṣṇu muditā</l>
. </lg>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.06" n="6">
. <l n="a">“nr̥pa dharmaputra ri təlas kumavruh irika</l>
. <l n="b">“dhana sāma bheda guṇa karma kāmaviṣaya</l>
8370 <l n="c">“naya rājanīti ṅuniveh śivāgama putus</l>
. <l n="d">“lalu yan kəneṅ mala vikalpa mogha vulaṅun</l>
. </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">

8385 </app>
. <app loc="c">

. </app>

. </app>
. <app loc="d">

. <rdg wit="#T">mogghā</rdg>
. </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.07" n="7">
8400 <l n="a">“hana ta vvaṅ uttama vicakṣaṇa vruh aṅaji</l>
. <l n="b">“mapirak surūpa manəhər sujanma guṇavan</l>
. <l n="c">“ri samaṅkananya hana tan tulusnya rahayu</l>
. <l n="d">“mada rāga moha ya dumehnya tan panulusa</l>
. </lg>

. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">hana</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">hanā</rdg>
. </app>

. <app loc="d">

. </app>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.08" n="8">
. <l n="a">“ndak ajar putuṅku ri katattvaniṅ kurukula</l>
. <l n="b">“ya dumehnya durjana kalā manahnya yan ala</l>
. <l n="c">“dadiniṅ surākala lavasnikaṅ vudubasu</l>
8435 <l n="d">“maharəp mamuktya ya dumehnya mūrkha satata</l>
. </lg>

. <l n="b">“makasādhanaṅ kala si medi mūrti śakunī</l>
8475 <l n="c">“sabatəknya kapva ya kabehnya tan hana vaneh</l>
. <l n="d">”dadiniṅ kalāharəp amuktya riṅ janapada</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.10" n="10">
. <l n="a">“tumurun ta sihnira bhaṭāra riṅ jana kabeh</l>
. <l n="b">“irikāṅutus ta sira deva pañcakuśika</l>
. <l n="c">“sira maṅdadī kita manāma pāṇḍava lima</l>

. <lg xml:id="kakavin_40.12" n="12">

. <l n="c">“mataṅenikaṅ lara ya kə̄lakən hananika</l>

. </div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="41" met="suvaṅśapattra" xml:id="kakavin_41">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
8595 <lg xml:id="kakavin_41.01" n="1">
. <l n="a">“muvah ika rəṅvakən pitutur i ṅhulun iki ta laki</l>
. <l n="b">“lava-lavaniṅ vənaṅ gumavayaṅ brata tapa kavikun</l>
. <l n="c">“daśaparamārtha taṅ taki-takin manəkəta riṅ ulah</l>
. <l n="d">“daśamala dohakən ya pinakādi musuh iṅ atapa</l>
8600 </lg>
. <listApp type="apparatus">
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">muvah</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">mvahh</rdg>
8605 </app>
. <app loc="a">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">pitutur</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pitutūr</rdg>
. </app>
8610 <app loc="b">
. <lem wit="#EdZ #T">lava-lavaniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#EdSSA #L #P">lava-lavanī</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="b">
8615 <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">gumavayaṅ brata</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">gumavveyaṅ braṭā</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="c">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">taṅ taki-takin manəkəta riṅ</lem>
8620 <rdg wit="#T">kaṅ taki-tākin əmakənta riṅṅ</rdg>
. </app>
. <app loc="d">
. <lem wit="#EdSSA #EdZ #L #P">pinakādi musuh iṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#T">pinakamusuh iṅṅ</rdg>
8625 </app>
. </listApp>
. <lg xml:id="kakavin_41.02" n="2">
. <l n="a">“kadi hana siddhaniṅ viku yadin karakətaniṅ ulah</l>
. <l n="b">“kaba-kaba len sapolahiṅ abuddhi vulatana pujin</l>
8630 <l n="c">“kadi maṅicuk manahniṅ umulat gatinika rinasan</l>
. <l n="d">“paməṅ-aməṅan hananya tuvi tan ləvihakəna təmən</l>
. </lg>

8655 <lg xml:id="kakavin_41.03" n="3">
. <l n="a">“daluvaṅ ikan lanā panusupan kadi vana gahana</l>
. <l n="b">“lagi pasənə̄taniṅ hala hajəṅ vruh aṅəmuk-əmuki</l>
. <l n="c">“pinakapañihnaniṅ para panəṅgahan i kaviratin</l>
. <l n="d">“viku kari saṅ viku ndi panəṅərta ri viku rasika</l>
